entry.g:title: BD MICRO-FINE PEN JARUM 31G X 5MM 320470 100S UNGGU
entry.g:description:
BD Micro-Fine Pen Needles 5mm 32G (0.25mm x 5mm) 100 needles Almost all people with diabetes now use a pen device to inject. They're a convenient way to deliver a precise dose with minimum fuss.
Increasingly, newly diagnosed people with diabetes as well as experienced insulin syringe users are choosing the insulin pen as their preferred choice of injection device. BD Micro-Fine Pen Needles are designed for single use and are available on prescription in three different needle lengths.
It is important to inject your insulin according to the recommendations given to you by your nurse or doctor. Consult them about the needle length and the injection technique most appropriate for you. Product Details Good Injection Guide 1. First wash your hands. 2. Attach the new needle onto the pen. Remove the outer and inner needle shield. 3. Make sure you rotate between injection sites. 4. Prime your pen as recommended and dial the required dose. 5. Pinch your skin, if recommended and insert the needle at a 90º angle. 6. Push the button down completely. Keep the button pressed down, count slowly to 10 before removing. 7. Carefully replace the outer cap. 8. Dispose of the needle in a suitable sharps container.
This guide is for educational purposes only. You should always follow the injection technique that your healthcare professional recommends. If you have any queries ask your Diabetes Nurse or Healthcare Professional for help.

MAL 17096017T
Proflex is a combination of turmeric and boswellia extract.
These combination of concentrated natural extracts are used traditionally to relief joint pains.
Standardisation of natural extract is essential to maintain consistency, purity and safety of the ingredient.
Inspired by nature and science, ProFlex is an advanced formula combining two known anti-inflammatory herbs, namely Turmeric and Boswellia serrata that help relieve inflammation, and reduce joint stiffness and joint pain. To ensure the product is of a good quality, safe and efficacious, it is standardized to contain 95% of curcuminoids and 60% of boswellic acid in every tablet.
Each 800mg tablet contains:
Rhizoma Curcuma Longa Extract 80 mg (standardized to contain 95% curcuminoids)
Resin Boswellia Serrata Extract 200 mg (standardized to contain 60% boswellic acid)
Adults: 1 tablet to be taken orally once daily after meal.

entry.g:title: La-Med Lungciser (Respiratory Lung Exerciser)
entry.g:description:
Lungciser: Respiratory Lung Exerciser - Intended use for increasing lung capacity.
Features - Provided with three color coded balls Red, Yellow, Blue in specially designed three stages chamber 600 CC/Sec, 900 CC/Sec, 1200 CC/Sec respectively for efficient and stepwise monitoring of improvements. - Made up of medical grade Poly carbonate material. - Provide detachable parts helpful in cleaning and maintenance. - Provide with tube and mouthpiece to easily inspiration. - Non-Sterile.
Benefits - Improving lung function - Reducing mucus buildup - Strengthening lungs during extended rest - Lowering the chance of developing lung infections
Instructions For Use: Step 1: Place your mouth around mouthpiece and Inhale Step2: Inhale thoroughly to lift the balls at the top Step3: Inhale as long as you comfortably can Step4: Remove the mouthpiece ane exhale properly Step5. Repeat the process
A Respiratory Lung Exerciser is used to help patients who are recovering from recent surgery keep their lungs active. However, Respiratory Exercisers can also be used by those with chronic respiratory conditions such as COPD, PF and emphysema. Get best price of Respiratory Lung Exerciser.
Whether you want to test the breathing capacity of your lungs or want to make your lungs stronger, a Respiratory Exerciser is a device that will come to your rescue. This device checks your breathing pattern and capacity depending on the volume of air you inhale and exhale along with the speed. It is used by physicians and at home to check the recovery post asthma, lung diseases and breathing disorders that can affect the functioning of your lungs.

entry.g:description: SYRINGE BD ULTRA-FINE SHORT NEEDLE (INSULIN) A syringe is a simple pump consisting of a plunger that fits tightly in a tube. The plunger can be pulled and pushed along inside a cylindrical tube (called a barrel), allowing the syringe to take in and expel a liquid or gas through an orifice at the open end of the tube. The open end of the syringe may be fitted with a hypodermic needle, a nozzle, or tubing to help direct the flow into and out of the barrel

entry.g:title: BIOCARBON ACTIVATED CHARCOAL TABLET 250MG 10'S
entry.g:description:
Biocarbon® consists of pure medicinal activated carbon and has cleansing, detoxifying properties. It is made from all-natural plant-based sources and helps alleviate diarrheas'.
Highly adsorptive activated vegetable carbon binds intestinal toxins and bacterial contaminants in the digestive tract. One gram of Biocarbon® activated vegetable carbon has a surface area that is equivalent to the total area of more than 8 tennis courts! The irritants are removed from the intestinal tract and the elimination of pathogenic substances is encouraged.
Activated vegetable carbon is a special kind of vegetable carbon that has been treated at extremely high temperatures to obtain an even higher porous surface structure than non-activated carbon. Millions of tiny pores in the surface structure make it possible to trap gases and toxins.
Activated vegetable carbon is used to effectively treat severe cases of diarrheas' and can even be applied during events of acute poisoning.
The activated carbon in Biocarbon® is made of 100% coconut shells.
Dosage: Take 4 tablets 3 times daily with enough fluid, with or after meals. The onset of action in the large intestine is within 8-10 hours. Biocarbon gently binds intestinal toxins and relieves diarrheas'.

entry.g:title: THELBAN Anti Worm Albendazole 200MG Tablet ubat cacing deworm 2 TABLETS 驱虫蛔虫药片
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Indications Roundworm, whipworm, pinworm, threadworm, hookworm, Strongyloidiasis infection, Taenia solium, Taenia saginata & Opisthorchis viverini present alone or as mixed.
DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION Dosage Adult & children over 2 years of age: 2 tablet of 200 mg ( TOTAL 400MG ) as a single dose with meals.
In cases of Strongyloides infestation: The usual dosage is 400 mg ( 2 TAB OF 200MG) once daily for 3 consecutive days.
In cases of Opisthorchis viverrini: 400 mg twice daily for 3 consecutive days.
Should be taken with food. Contraindications Pregnancy. Special Precautions High dose. Adverse Drug Reactions Epigastric pain, headache, dizziness, pruritus, GI disturbances, diarrhea. Leukopenia alopecia & raised liver enzyme values.
INGREDIENTS Each 5 ml contains: Albendazole 100 mg Methylparaben (as preservative) 0.15% Propylparaben (as preservative) 0.02%

entry.g:title: A-ZOLE SUSPENSION Albendazole 200mg/5ml x10ML Ubat Cacing Deworm 驱虫蛔虫药 10ml EXP : 09-2023
entry.g:description:
EXP : 09-2023
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION A-zole 200mg/5ml Suspension is used for the treatment of single or mixed intestinal helmintic infestations, including pinworm, whipworm, roundworm, hookworm, tapeworm, trichinosis and threadworm (strongyloides).
Flavour: Strawberry
INGREDIENTS Each 10ml contains: Albendazole 400mg
Albendazole and mebendazole are well tolerated, with no adverse events in pregnant women and their fetuses when given AFTER THE FIRST TRIMESTER OF PREGNANCY.
Anthelminthic / De-worm medicines MUST NOT be given during the first trimester.
HOW TO TAKE IT 1. For infestation of pinworm, whipworm, roundworm, hookworm and trichinosis:
Adults and children above 2 years: Take 10ml (400mg) as a single dose.
Children 1 to 2 years: Give 5ml (200mg) as a single dose.
2. For infestation of tapeworm and threadworm (strongyloides):
Adults and children above 2 years: Take 10ml (400mg) once daily for 3 consecutive days.
Children 1 to 2 years: Give 5ml (200mg) once daily for 3 consecutive days.
A second course may be repeated after 2 to 3 weeks if infestations persist or recur. To be taken with meal. Shake well before use.

entry.g:title: M-ZOLE CHEWABLE TABLET Mebendazole 500mg 1 tablet deworm Ubat Cacing 驱虫蛔虫药片 EXP: 09-2023
entry.g:description:
EXP: 09-2023 ONE TAB PER BOX
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Common worms enter our body through 2 main ways: 1. contamination of food by worm eggs 2. penetration of our skin by worm larvae
The incidence of worm varies in different countries from as high as 90% to as low as 5%. Incidence tends to be higher in areas where farming is widespread and untreated sewage is used as fertilisers. Children are particularly easy targets for common worm infections are being active, they are outdoors most of the time. In Malaysia, the most common worm infection is whipworm, followed by roundworm, hookworm, pinworm and threadworm. Whipworm is one of the most difficult to kill. Because the soil conditions for the breeding these common worms' eggs (except pinworm) are rather similar, often a patient is infected with more than one type of worm at the same time. Therefore the deworming medicine chosen should preferably be one that can kill all types of common worms.
M-Zole Chewable Tablet is a single does treatment against single or mixed intestinal helmintic infestations. It eradicates pinworm, whipworm, roundworm, hookworm, tapeworm, trichinella and threadworm (strongyloides).
M-Zole Tablet - rawatan jangkitan cacing tunggal atau campuran dengan satu dos sahaja. Ia membasmikan cacing kerawit, cacing cambuk, cacing gelang, cacing kait, cacing pita, cacing trikinella dan cacing benang(strongiloides).
Use In Prenancy and Lactation Pregnancy: Category C. Not recommended during pregnancy. Lactation: Mebendazole should not be used during lactation unless the potential benefit justifies the risk to the baby.
✅Dos: Kanak-kanak 2 tahun hingga dewasa- 1 tablet sekali sahaja. Boleh dikunyah atau dihancurkan dan dicampurkan ke dalam jus atau makanan.
Dosage: Pin worms (Enterobiasis): Adult: 100 mg as a single dose; may repeat if necessary 2-3 wk after initial treatment. Child: >2 yr Same as adult dose. Ascariasis, Trichuriasis, Hookworm infections Adult: 100 mg 2 times daily for 3 consecutive days or 500 mg as single dose. Child: >1 yr Same as adult dose.
服用方法： 成人以及 2岁以上儿童： 10毫升 或者 1 粒。饭后服用。 服用过后如果又被感染 ， 2 到3 星期后可以再服一次。

Dosage: - Adults & children above 2 years: take 10ml (1 bottle) as a single dose. - Shake well before use. - A second dose may be repeated after 2 to 3 weeks if infestations persists or recurs.
服用方法： 成人以及 2岁以上儿童： 10毫升 或者 1 粒。饭后服用。 服用过后如果又被感染 ， 2 到3 星期后可以再服一次。
Precautions: - If infestation persists or recurs, please consult a doctor. - Should not be administered during confirmed or suspected pregnancy. - All family member and others in close contact should be treated at the same time in order to prevent reinfestation.
Storage: Store below 25°C. Protect from direct sunlight and heat. Keep cap tightly closed.

entry.g:title: FOGGING Solution Disinfectant Santizer 3 IN 1 BZK88-5L Fresh LAVENDER Ready To Use 清香 3合1 雾化消毒液 5000 ML
entry.g:description:
MAX 4 BOT PER ORDER, NOT FOR EAST MALAYSIA Features Fresh LAVENDER fragrance BZK88-5L contains 0.08% Benzalkonium Chloride. It is a non-alcohol Quaternary Ammonium multipurpose disinfectant. (MAX 4 ORDER) It is fast and effective in sanitation of hard surface & food based equipment.
3 in 1 - air, hand and surfaces (use with microfiber cloth to ensure maximum efficacy)
Usage Instruction ^^^ Enclosed environment - fogging: For offices, commercial kitchen, restaurant, school, retail shop, places of worship and any other enclosed places with high customer traffic - fogging is the most effective way to disinfect every corner of the premise. Perform fogging with all windows and doors closed. After fogging leave the space closed for at least 10-15 minutes before open the windows and doors for ventilation. Daily or less frequent as per the requirement. Use together with wiping / spraying routine to get total protection. ^^^ Hard Surfaces - wipe with microfiber cloth: Avoid using cotton cloth since it may reduce the efficacy of the Quaternary Ammonium disinfectant. Or, by spraying onto the surfaces using a spray gun or manual hand spray bottle. After wiping or spraying, leave the disinfectant to dry for at lease 10-15 minutes. Apply once daily or more frequent as needed. ^^^ Vehicles - wiping and fogging: For commercial passenger vehicles wiping critical area of the vehicles after a job has been done is mandatory, plus daily fogging. For private usage vehicles wipe the critical parts after every outing. Fog the car at least once a week. Close the vehicles for 10-15 minutes in order for the disinfection process to be completed. ^^^ BZK88-5L is safe to be in contact with hands. It is non drying to the hands.
Cautions Keep out of reach of children. Use disinfectants away from kids. Make sure young children are out of the room when using disinfectants, and for a little while afterward. Wear protective mask at all times when using the BZK88-5L(

Armor8 is a revolutionary long-lasting sterilising nano spray. It uses light to eliminates bacteria, fungi, mold & allergens that causes illness & odors.
Fast, effective and long lasting, Armor8 is easy to use and protects your home, office and car by:
Killing 99.9% of germs on hard and soft surfaces.
Eliminates odors caused by bacteria, tackles unpleasant odors and leaving our home clean.
Killing to source of mold allergen and controlling the growth of mold and mildew on hard surfaces.
Armor8 spray is our ultimate in germ busting technology. Armor 8 eliminates germs such as:
*E Coli
*Human Pappiloma Virus (HPV)
*Streptcocca Bacteria
*Klebsiella
*Staphylococcus Aureus
The sprays are ideal for mothers, pet owners, gym enthusiasts, car owners, office workers and can also be used in public spaces such as preschools, food & beverage outlets and restrooms.
Protection against harmful bacteria and viruses
Previously only available commercially for businesses and public buildings, this award-winning Japanese technology is now available for the public to use at home or wherever they are. Armor8’schemical solutions are specially formulated tohelp fight against harmful allergens, microbials, bacteria, and viruses.These products are EPA-registered, hospital-grade disinfectant cleaners that kill 99.999% of bacteria including MRSA, Norovirus, E. coli, Salmonella enterica, Staphylococcus aureus, Legionella pneumophilia, Aspergillus niger and many more. These safe but effective sanitizers can help transform your residence or facility into a healthy environment.
Killing mold spores and odors
Our disinfectant sanitizers are also super-effective when it comes to killing mold spores and eliminating odors. Often, removing mold and bacteria can involve using strong chemicals, such as chlorine bleach products. These types of caustic solutions can produce trihalomethanes (THM) and halo-acetic acids (H AAS), that may trigger health problems which are linked to cancer. Armor8’s products contain only chemicals ruled to be safe and non-carcinogenic – safe enough foranysurface in your home or facility.

entry.g:title: ASCABS ANTI SCABIES Head Lice Anti Kudis Buta Anti Kutu Permethrin 5% LOTION 30ML Hoe 1st choice by CDC USA EXP:06/2022
entry.g:description:
EXP:06/2022 **** 1st choice by CDC USA **** THIS ITEM DIRECT SUPPLY FROM ZUELLIG 100% AUTHENTIC First-line therapy by CDC (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, USA). Effective, well tolerated and safe. Pilihan pertama olih CDC (Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, USA). Berkesan, senang diterina dan selamat.
PANDUAN DARI KKM Pengenalan Kudis buta adalah sejenis jangkitan kulit yang boleh berjangkit disebabkan oleh sejenis hama. Hama adalah sejenis makhluk seperti serangga yang membentuk laluan/terowong di bawah lapisan luar kulit. Hama bertelur di bawah kulit dan menghisap darah dari mangsanya. Kudis buta dijangkiti melalui sentuhan langsung kulit ke kulit. Semua orang tanpa mengira peringkat umur terdedah kepada jangkitan ini. Kudis buta yang menjangkiti haiwan tidak boleh menjangkiti manusia, ia hanya akan menyebabkan ruam. Rawatan Cuci pakaian dan cadar yang telah digunakan oleh orang yang dijangkiti dengan air panas. Masukkan perkara yang tidak boleh dicuci ke dalam beg plastik yang tertutup dan simpan selama sekurang-kurangnya tujuh hari untuk membolehkan hama dan telurnya mati. Perabut dan tempat tidur perlu dibersihkan dengan pencuci hampagas. Orang yang bergaul rapat dan tinggal bersama orang yang telah dijangkiti kudis buta harus dirawat pada masa yang sama. Rawatan kudis buta termasuklah menyapu krim atau losyen seperti : A. Permethrin 5%
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Acts on the nerve cell membrane to disrupt the sodium channel current by which the polarization of the membrane is regulated. Delayed repolarization and paralysis of the pests is the outcome.
Treatment of infestation with head lice ( Pediculus humanus capitis ) and its nits (eggs). A-Scabs, a pyrethroid, is active against a broad range of pests including lice, ticks, fleas, mites, and other arthropods. Topical/Cutaneous Head pediculosis
Indications: For the treatment of scabies and head lice
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION For Scabies: Apply lotion thoroughly to all body parts from the head to the soles of the feet and leave the medication on for 8-14 hours, then wash off completely. For Head Lice: Apply sufficient amount to saturate washed and towel-dried hair and scalp, leave on for 10 min before rinsing. May be repeated after 7-10 days if necessary.
Use during Lactation Because less than 2% is absorbed after topical application, rapid metabolism to inactive metabolites and safe application directly on infants' skin, topical permethrin products are acceptable in nursing mothers. However, do not apply to the breast.
INGREDIENTS Permethrin 5% w/v

Osteoporosis is a condition in which bones become fragile, leading to a higher risk of breaks or fractures. ActivMax High Calcium Vanilla is a complete, balanced and low glycemic nutritional drink specially formulated for ladies, elderly, people who are concerned about bone health and the population who are at risk of osteoporosis. 500mg of elemental calcium per serving Bone health promoting nutrients Low Glycemic Index, suitable for diabetics 28 vitamins and minerals Prolonged energy levels Ideal for weight control No cholesterol No trans fat Lactose-free
What it is? ActivMax High Calcium Vanilla is a tasty and healthy calcium drink that is specially formulated for maintaining bone health.
It is incorporated with a high amount of calcium helps in supporting strong and healthy bones and improving strength to keep doing what you love.
One serving of ActivMax High Calcium Vanilla provides 500 mg of elemental calcium which is equivalent to 50% of your recommended daily calcium intake.
Dosage and administration Add 50g (2 scoops) of ActivMax High Calcium Vanilla to a glass of warm water (240ml), stir vigorously until the powder is completely mixed. Drink while it is fresh.
Additional information ActivMax High Calcium Vanilla can be taken at any time of the day as meal replacement for men and women above 12 years old. Opened bottles should be tightly closed and stored in a cool, dry place, but not refrigerated. Once opened, consume within 2 months.

entry.g:title: NUTRIFORTE INCREASE IMMUNITY Non-Acidic Vitamin C 1000 mg with Bioflavonoids 60s Tab
entry.g:description:
MAL06030877XC
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION: "Vitamin C is often associated with the treatment and prevention of the common cold. However, the benefits of Vitamin C reach far beyond that. It is a powerful antioxidant which prevents free radical damage to body tissues. Vitamin C is also a vital component needed for the production of proteins, collagen and elastin, which help strengthen arteries, bones, teeth and cartilages in the body.
Unlike most animals, humans cannot make their own Vitamin C. We have to depend on daily replenishment to fulfill our body's requirements as well as to combat stress and environmental pollution.
Nutriforte Non-Acidic Vitamin C is SUPERIOR to other Vitamin C. Unlike conventional Vitamin C, also known as ascorbic acid (acidic form), Nutriforte Non-Acidic Vitamin C containing calcium ascorbate (providing Vitamin C 1000mg) is specially formulated to produce a non-acidic (pH neutral) form of Vitamin C, making it gentle on the stomach. This offers an excellent alternative to those with sensitive stomachs and gastric problems.
Nutriforte Non-Acidic Vitamin C also contains natural bioflavonoids, which increase the effectiveness of Vitamin C by preventing it from being destroyed by oxidation in the body. These bioflavonoids also work synergistically to increase the absorption of Vitamin C in the body."
OVERVIEW: "Buffered with calcium ascorbates making it gentle on the stomach Contains natural bioflavonoids extract to help boost its action in the body Reduces the severity and duration of colds Potent antioxidant Necessary for collagen and protein formation"
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION: 1 tablet daily after food. 1 tablet 2 times daily under special circumstances, eg during flu epidemic
INGREDIENTS: "Composition per tab:
Vitamin C 1000mg
Bioflavonoid 10mg
Rutin 10mg
Hesperidin 10mg"

It has the combination of electric liquid vaporizer, which is almost odorless and very clean with prolonged mosquito free protection during usages, as well as the immediate fast action of the aerosol spray efficacy, BUT without all the negative effects, i.e. needs of electric power, strong pungent smell, large size, not portable and high cost per usages of regular aerosol products. Metofluthrin highly evaporate character make MozOne can achieve 4 corners spray up to 8 hours protection.

entry.g:title: (By Carton) ECPI WAVE ENERGY DRINKING WATER 12 X 1.5 Liter
entry.g:description: One Carton Per Order ECPI Water is a combination of water treatment system and electromagnetic wave technology. ~ These combination produces a unique water good to maintain your healthiness The following water treatment systems and technology are being used to produce ECPI water. 1. Reverse Osmosis (RO) Treatment. Reverse osmosis (RO) has become a common method for the treatment of household drinking water supplies. Effectiveness of RO units depends on initial levels of contamination and water pressure. RO treatment may be used to reduce the levels of: * Naturally occurring substances that cause water supplies to be unhealthy or unappealing (foul tastes, smells or colors). * Substances that have contaminated the water supply resulting in possible adverse health effects or decreased desirability. RO systems are typically used to reduce the levels of total dissolved solids and suspended matter. 2. Oxygenated Water Oxygen and water are essential elements for the proper functioning of the body. Water usually contains anywhere between 1 to 10 ppm (parts per million) of dissolved oxygen. Oxygenated water contains extra levels of oxygen to be dissolved and stabilized. Obviously, the digestive system cannot process oxygen into the blood stream as fast as the respiratory system. But drinking oxygenated water can supplement your oxygen supply and thereby help to maximize the oxygen saturation in your blood. This is going to optimize metabolic function. Extra oxygen will improve physical stamina, better sleep, intestinal cleansing and more energy. ECPI water has 20% more oxygen than normal water. Currently, a bottle of 500ml oxygenated water cost RM3. ECPI water has more benefits (other than oxygen) for the same amount of price and volume. 3. Alkaline Water pH (the power, or potential, of Hydrogen) = the unit that indicates the hydrogen density of acid and alkaline water. Water becomes acidic with increased hydrogen ions (H+), and alkaline with increased hydroxyl ions (-OH). E

entry.g:description: Best Face Washcloths and Towels For Your Face You might have had a “holy grail face cleanser” or spent $100 on flawless skin, but you have yet to achieve that. Want to know why? The answer is that you’re probably using the same towel or washcloth for your face, hands, and feet, or you’re using a harsh and low-quality washcloth and face towel to wipe off makeup and dust from your face. Can you relate? Of course, you can. Why You Need Quality Face Washcloth It doesn’t need to be said that our face gives someone the first impression about us from the very beginning, so we need a clean and radiant face to boost our confidence. You might not have any idea that a quality face washcloth can change your life. Yes! You heard right. Say goodbye to your extra cleansing tools and save your money to buy more drugstore makeup instead. Microfiber Face Cloth As you can see, these washcloths are made out of the best material, which is microfiber (80% polyester and 20% polyamide). You don’t need to worry about the quality and outcome of this product. This face cloth is specially fortified for facial cleansing, but the good news is you can also use this as a kitchen towel, house cleaning cloth, or even use it in the gym. Now, as far as method goes, it’s super easy. Just dip the washcloth in warm water and start the exfoliation procedure as mentioned above. Key Features It easily removes makeup and grease without any extra cosmetics. It helps to remove dead skin cells, opens your pores to let them breathe, and removes all the sticky dirt and harmful chemicals caused by makeup usage. It provides you with an acne-free face after several washes as it’s able to exfoliate your face. You’ll have soft, glossy, and radiant skin after every wipe! It has specially crafted waffle weaves which help to clean your face gently. Pros Easy to clean. Multiple uses. Best fabric. Great price. Cautions Stay away from bleach, tumble dryers, or ironing. It may kill the moisture and useful substances in the cloth. Rinse it with plain water and let it air dry naturally.

*BALANCES pH OF URINE: It manages the production and composition of urine, thereby balancing its pH, which is often a cause for UTI's and the burning sensation while emptying your bladder.
*HELPS REDUCE STONE FORMATION: Cystone works by managing the concentration of calcium salts in the blood, which contributes to the formation of stones, and aids in breaking them down and expelling them from the body. It does this by acting on mucin, the sticky substance which binds the particles together to form stones.
*NATURAL DIURETIC: Cystone naturally increases the excretion of excess water from the body, thereby increasing urine production and reducing bloating. This reduces the chances of you catching repeat urinary infections.
*ALL NATURAL SUPPLEMENT: As it is made of natural ingredients based on Ayurveda, Cystone does not exhibit any side effects as long as the recommended dose and use is not exceeded.
*HIGH-QUALITY PRODUCT: Himalaya's manufacturing facilities are GMP (Good Manufacturing Practices) certified and ISO 9001:2008 certified from NQA. Their Research & Development facility is GLP (Good Laboratory Practices) and GCP (Good Clinical Practices) certified and is recognized by India's Institute of Health Sciences as an approved Ph.D. Centre.

BZK As a Bioactive agents, especially for its antimicrobial activity, benzalkonium chloride is an active ingredient in many consumer products: >Pharmaceutical products such as eye, ear and nasal drops or sprays, as a preservative >Personal care products such as hand sanitizers, wet wipes, shampoos, soaps, deodorants and cosmetics >Skin antiseptics and wound wash sprays, such as Bactine. >Throat lozenges[6] and mouthwashes, as a biocide >Spermicidal creams >Over-the-counter single-application treatments for herpes, cold-sores, and fever blisters >Burn and ulcer treatment >Spray disinfectants for hard surface sanitization >Cleaners for floor and hard surfaces as a disinfectant, such as Lysol and Dettol antibacterial spray and wipes. >Algaecides for clearing of algae, moss, lichens from paths, roof tiles, swimming pools, masonry, etc. Usage Instruction BZK88 消毒液的用法 BZK88 is a universal disinfectant and can be used in the following ways. 1.Hand - just spray sufficient amount on hands and rub thoroughly when needed. 2.Hard Surfaces - wipe with microfibre cloth, avoid using cotton cloth since it may reduce the efficacy of the Quaternary Ammonium disinfectant. Or, by spraying onto the surfaces using a spray gun or manual hand spray bottle. Apply once daily or more frequent as needed. 3.Enclosed environment such as offices, commercial kitchen, restaurant, school, retail shop, places of worship and any other places with high customer traffic - fogging is the most effective way to disinfect every corner of the premise. Daily or less frequent as per the requirement. Use together with wiping / spraying routine to get total protection. 4.Vehicles - disinfect by wiping or plus fogging. For commercial passenger vehicles wiping critical area of the vehicles after a job has been done is mandatory, plus daily fogging. For private usage vehicles wipe the critical parts after every outing. Fog the car at least once a week. (Refer to fogging machine manual for proper way of fogging). BZK88 是一个多用途消毒液. 1.手 - 喷在手上 然后搓手至两手完全被消毒液覆盖. 2.硬表面 - 抹：用超细纤维布抹 喷：用喷机均匀的喷。处理后的表面让其自然干. 3.封闭的空间 - 雾化消毒是最有效的方法。跟抹或喷的消毒方式搭 配就能达到全方位消毒的效果. 4.交通工具 - 抹 或者 跟雾方法搭配. 客车：每送完一个顾客后都要用抹的消毒方法处理顾客所接触过的地方. 每天下班后都要雾化消毒汽车。私用汽车：每次从外回来都要做抹的消毒处理. 每星期做一次雾化消毒。（如何操作雾化机 请详细根据雾化

entry.g:title: MS. TELLME HCG PREGNANCY TEST BIOTEST 1S
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
Planning to have a baby is one of the most exciting times in a couple's life. Once you've decided you're ready to be pregnant, it's natural to feel a little impatient for it to happen soon!
When a woman suspects she is pregnant she might greet the prospect with joy – or panic. If you suspect you might be pregnant, the first thing to do is be sure. While many women think they must see their doctor for accurate pregnancy results, the truth is Ms. tell me pregnancy tests are as accurate as a doctor's urine test. You can quickly check if you are pregnant with a home pregnancy test and save the time and cost of a trip to the doctor.
The Ms.Tellme Pregnancy Test Kits detect a hormone in the urine that the body produces during pregnancy - hCG (human chorionic gonadotropin). The amount of pregnancy hormone increases as pregnancy progresses. However, the test can be performed anytime of the day and as early as the first day of missing the period as it is capable of detecting the presence of 25mIU/ml of hCG in the urine.
MPORTANT: After you have completed the pregnancy test, whether you are pregnant or not, a rose pink color band will appear in the control portion of the window. This indicates that the Midstream test is working properly. As urine initially passes through the viewing window, the test band may momentarily be visible. This is not necessarily indicative of a positive result. Interpret results only after the complete test reaction time of 3 minutes.
Positive: If 2 pink lines appear, 1 in the round testing window and 1 in the triangle control window, the test is positive and you can assume you are pregnant. Even if the lines are very light in color, you can still assume you are pregnant.
Negative: If only 1 pink line appears in the triangle control window, the test is negative and you can assume you are not pregnant.
Invalid: If a pink line does not appear in the triangle control window, the test is invalid. Invalid results may be an indication that the absorbent tip was not thoroughly saturated in urine. In this case, either urinate on the absorbent tip for additional time or re-dip the absorbent tip for 15 seconds and wait 3 minutes to read results. If there is still no pink line in the triangle control window, the test is invalid and testing should be repeated in a few days with a new Ms. Tell me Pregnancy Test. Follow the instructions exactly, making sure the absorbent tip is thoroughly saturated with urine. Each test is designed for a single use and should not be reused.

entry.g:title: NOVA Zarthrimin Glucosamine Powder 1500mg 30 sachet
entry.g:description:
Zarthrimin Oral Powder is a sodium-free formulation, and artificial sweetener free of glucosamine sulphate. One sachet delivers an optimal dose of 1500mg glucosamine in a pleasant tasting drink, giving you the convenience of a daily dose for optimum joint protection.
30 Sachets x 4 Grams : RM 143.30 Triple strength formulation Sodium free Easy to drink with fruity flavour MAL 07021535X
Zarthrimin Oral Powder is a white coloured fine powder with an exciting combination of both sweet and sour tastes. Glucosamine is known to manage joint pains and may help in cartilage regeneration. Each sachet is approximately 4gm of powder to be dissolved in water.
Each sachet (4 gm) contains: Glucosamine sulphate potassium chloride 1990 mg (Equivalent to 1500 mg glucosamine sulphate)
The content of one sachet should be taken orally once daily, 15 minutes before meal. The recommended duration of therapy is 3 months, and may be repeated after intervals of 2 months (or according to medical prescription). Dissolve 1 sachet of Zarthrimin oral powder in a glass of lukewarm water. Stir well and drink.
The therapeutic effect of glucosamine is only seen after 1 week. Therefore, it is advisable to include anti-inflammatory drug (in case of severe pain) during the first few days of treatment with glucosamine. Keep out of reach of children. The administration in patients with severe hepatic or renal insufficiency should be made under medical supervision. Protect from light and moisture. Store below 30oC. Avoid exposure to excessive heat. Administration during the first 3 months of pregnancy should be avoided. Source of glucosamine is derived from seafood.

entry.g:title: LACTUL SOLUTION for constipation Lactulose 100ML YSP (EXP : 09 2023)
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION YSP Lactul may also be used for other purposes not listed in this medication guide. Therapeutically, YSP Lactul has laxative and ammonia-detoxifying actions. In treating constipation YSP Lactul metabolites draw water into the bowel, causing a cathartic effect through osmotic action.
DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION Adult : 15 – 30ml daily in a single dose or 2 divided doses. Children 6 – 12 years : 20ml daily, 1-5 years: 10ml daily, <1 year: 5ml daily.

Reverse Osmosis (RO) Treatment. Reverse osmosis (RO) has become a common method for the treatment of household drinking water supplies. Effectiveness of RO units depends on initial levels of contamination and water pressure. RO treatment may be used to reduce the levels of: * Naturally occurring substances that cause water supplies to be unhealthy or unappealing (foul tastes, smells or colors). * Substances that have contaminated the water supply resulting in possible adverse health effects or decreased desirability. RO systems are typically used to reduce the levels of total dissolved solids and suspended matter. 2. Oxygenated Water Oxygen and water are essential elements for the proper functioning of the body. Water usually contains anywhere between 1 to 10 ppm (parts per million) of dissolved oxygen. Oxygenated water contains extra levels of oxygen to be dissolved and stabilized. Obviously, the digestive system cannot process oxygen into the blood stream as fast as the respiratory system. But drinking oxygenated water can supplement your oxygen supply and thereby help to maximize the oxygen saturation in your blood. This is going to optimize metabolic function. Extra oxygen will improve physical stamina, better sleep, intestinal cleansing and more energy. ECPI water has 20% more oxygen than normal water. Currently, a bottle of 500ml oxygenated water cost RM3. ECPI water has more benefits (other than oxygen) for the same amount of price and volume. 3. entry.g:description:
Product Features: • Extra Stable Wide Base, Trusty cane. • 4 points of contact to provide superior balance and stability • Provide secure, reliable support on any surface • 10 grips in total for Handle height adjusting. • Handle height is adjustable from 68cm to 95cm allowing for custom comfort • Now you can enjoy the freedom to go anywhere you like, stride by stride with at you side! • Easily for Compact Storage • Stand on its own without falling • All-terrain design • Ergonomically designed handle with soft Vinyl Contoured Grip provides comfort and security • Material: Aluminium alloy • Made from Sturdy aluminium construction. • Color: Gold • Supports up to 500lbs. • Adaptable for right or left-handed users.
Walking with a Quad Cane Follow the steps below when you walk with a quad cane. • Step 1: Hold the quad cane in the hand opposite your injured or weaker leg. Make sure the flat side of the quad cane is closest to your body • Step 2: Place all four legs of the quad cane on the ground when you move it forward. Your quad cane should be about one step length ahead of you. Keep it close to your body for support and balance. • Step 3: Step forward with your weaker leg. • Step 4: Support your weight with both the quad cane and your injured leg. Step through with your stronger leg.
Tip: • Do not take a step unless your quad cane is firmly on the ground. • Do not place your quad cane too far forward. The quad cane should be directly across from the instep of your weaker foot. • Do not take steps that are too big. • When turning, take small steps • Check your quad cane tips regularly. Replace them when they are worn. • Be careful when walking on uneven or wet surfaces. • Use good posture when walking. • Check your balance before stepping. • Walk at a safe pace.

entry.g:description:
Fotagel is made from the following ingredient:-
Dioctahedral smectite (15 g/100mL) - It improves patient’s health condition by having high adsorbent property. The outcome resulted from taking Fotagel are subjected to the intention of using it and the appropriate dosage of the medication consumed. It is advisable to take this medication before eating. The drug should be strictly taken as per prescribeddosage by the doctor.
You can obtain it from a local pharmacy. There are a few generic variants available as well. The drug is considered as inexpensive by popular opinion. Please check the expiry date and prescription details mentioned on this packaging of 10 packets. It is manufactured byIpsen Pharma
How to use Fotagel? Swallow the medicine according to the dose prescribed by your doctor. Take the medicine two or three times a day. Minum dengan air 30 minit sebelum makan, satu hari 3 kali.
How does it work?
Dioctahedral smectite improves patient’s health condition by having high adsorbent property. Patients with kidney problems and liver disease need toconsult with a doctorbefore consuming Fotagel. The dosage should be taken as advised by the doctor. Keep enough gap between two dosages. The time taken for this medicine to show its effect is subjected to changes based on the intended use and dosage of medicine consumed. If there is no relief from the symptoms within 3 month of use, please talk to a doctor for an alternative solution. General advice for Fotagel:
Always complete the course of treatment as prescribed by doctor and do not stop even if you start to feel better. Do not give this medication to someone you feel has a similar symptoms. Similarly, do not consume this medication on the advice from a friend or family. Please ensure theexpiry dateon the package or with the pharmacist before purchasing the medication. Make sure to keepFotagel in a room temperature environment and avoid direct exposure to heat & sunlight Fotagel only provides a temporary relief from certain symptoms and is not the definitive cure. Discontinue Fotagel or inform your doctor if any rashes or other side effects occur. As Fotagel is an antidiarrhea, you might be able to get it without a doctor's prescription. It is advisable to seek professional medical opinion before consuming this medication. Fotagel medication has several uses as well as side effects, users are advised to read the the information about the medication thoroughly. Please consult a doctorespecially before taking Fotagel. If you have any of the following conditions &contraindications:-
Allergy to Fotagel or any of its components It is not recommended for children & Neonates. Please keep it out of reach from them Constipation Please stop using this medication if you are experiencing these symptoms and conditions.

entry.g:title: STEMLABS OMEGA 3 1000MG HALAL NEW ZEALAND 360S
entry.g:description:
EXP 25.8.2023How much Omega-3 do we really need?
The National Institute of Health recommends 0.6g – 1.0g of Marine Omega 3 per day
The family of Omega- 3s Fatty Acids
Omega-3 fatty acids are essential, that they cannot be synthesized by the human body. Therefore, the dietary intake of Omega-3 is necessary to maintain sufficient amounts in the body.
EPA is obtained in the diet by eating fatty fish like salmon, mackerel and sardines or through fish oil supplements.
DHA is commonly found alongside EPA in fatty fish and fish oil, or in alga oil supplements. It is essential to brain and eye development, heart health and cognitive function. Small fish are safer to consume?
Large fish that are higher in the food chain — such as shark, tilefish, swordfish and king mackerel. They tend to have higher levels of mercury than smaller fish. Larger fish eat the smaller fish, gaining higher concentrations of the toxin. The longer a fish lives, the larger it grows and the more mercury it can collect. Mercury occurs naturally in small amounts in the environment. Sardines and anchovies are far down on the food chain, therefore they are safer alternative compare to larger fish.
Enjoy StemLabs Omega 3 Fish Oil DHA 120mg EPA 180mg
- Good Quality -Fully imported from New Zealand - Toxin Free – source from small fishes: Sardine, Mackerel & Anchovies - Purity - Molecular distillation for concentrated purity - Economical & Affordable – Family pack
Storage Recommendations
It is recommended that fish oil supplements are stored in a dark, cool and dry place, away from heat. You can keep fish oil in the refrigerator, but do not take the bottle out and allow it to cool. This causes moisture condensation on the capsules.

entry.g:title: BZK21 QAC Aromatherapy Disinfectant Sanitizer with Aromatherapy Sea Breeze Essential Oil Non Alcohol 4 Liter
entry.g:description:
# NOT AVAILABLE FOR SABAH & SARAWAK # # Tiada penghantaran ke Sabah & Sarawak # Please order max 4 only per checkout to avoid over-weight shipping damage !
ACTIVE INGREDIENT Benzalkonium Chloride 0.16% (QAC) Sea Breeze AromaTherapy Essential Oil q.s.
USAGE INSTRUCTION It is Ready To Use. Do Not Dilute. Use by manual spraying, wiping & rubbing. After application, let the contact surface to dry naturally. DO NOT RINSE AFTER APPLYING
SUITABLE FOR USE on hand and hard surfaces. For Home, Schools, Religious Institutions, Commercial Premises, Industrial Factories, Healthcare Facilities, Food Preparation Premises etc. It contains No Alcohol, Colourless, Non-greasy, Non-sticky, Non-toxic, Non-irritating & Child Friendly
Benzalkonium chloride (BZK) is a major non-alcohol-based active ingredient used for clinical, food line, and domestic household biocide.
Kill 99.99% of germ, bacteria, fungi &viruses.
A biocide is a general term for a chemical agent, that may be applied topically in/on living tissue (antiseptic) or on inanimate objects (disinfectant), in order to inhibit growth of (“-static”) or kill (“-cidal”) microorganisms
Benzalkonium chloride BZK is used in many non-consumer processes and products, including as an active ingredient in surgical disinfection.
An advantage of benzalkonium chloride, not shared by ethanol-based antiseptics or hydrogen peroxide antiseptic, is that it does not cause a burning sensation when applied to broken skin.
The FDA has stated that benzalkonium chloride is eligible as an alternative for use in the formulation of healthcare personnel hand rubs.
In November 2020 The Journal of Hospital Infection published a study on benzalkonium chloride formulations; it was found that laboratory and commercial disinfectants with 0.13% to 0.28% inactivated the SARS-CoV-2 virus within 15 seconds of contact, even in the presence of a soil or hard water.
This resulted in a growing consensus that BZK sanitizers are just as effective as alcohol-based sanitizers despite the CDC guidelines.
As a hand sanitizer, use of BZK may be advantageous over ethanol in some situations because it has significantly more residual antibacterial action on the skin after initial application.
Benzalkonium chloride has demonstrated persistent antimicrobial activity for up to four hours after contact where as ethanol-based sanitizer demonstrate skin protection for only 10 minutes post-application.

entry.g:title: MS. TELLME MIDSTREAM PREGNANCY Test 1s
entry.g:description:
Midstream It's a Easy One-Step Test. The box contains only 1 test device where you will urinate directly on the absorbent tip
IMPORTANT: After you have completed the pregnancy test, whether you are pregnant or not, a rose pink color band will appear in the control portion of the window. This indicates that the Midstream test is working properly. As urine initially passes through the viewing window, the test band may momentarily be visible. This is not necessarily indicative of a positive result. Interpret results only after the complete test reaction time of 3 minutes. Positive: If 2 pink lines appear, 1 in the round testing window and 1 in the triangle control window, the test is positive and you can assume you are pregnant. Even if the lines are very light in color, you can still assume you are pregnant. Negative: If only 1 pink line appears in the triangle control window, the test is negative and you can assume you are not pregnant. Invalid: If a pink line does not appear in the triangle control window, the test is invalid. Invalid results may be an indication that the absorbent tip was not thoroughly saturated in urine. In this case, either urinate on the absorbent tip for additional time or re-dip the absorbent tip for 15 seconds and wait 3 minutes to read results. If there is still no pink line in the triangle control window, the test is invalid and testing should be repeated in a few days with a new Ms. Tell me Pregnancy Test. Follow the instructions exactly, making sure the absorbent tip is thoroughly saturated with urine. Each test is designed for a single use and should not be reused.

entry.g:title: DOXIUM 500MG 30 CAPS
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Doxium (500 mg) corrects medical conditions in a variety of areas, including hemorrhoids, symptoms of pain and cramps, pins and needles sensations, varicose veins (oedema), skin complaints related to venous disorders, diabetic retinopathy or similar related to small blood vessels, as well as a supplement to sclerotic or certain surgical treatment.
Calcium dobesilate acts on the capillary walls by regulating its impaired physiological functions-increased permeability and decreased resistance. It increases erythrocyte flexibility, inhibits platelet hyperaggregation and in diabetic retinopathy, it reduces plasma and blood hyperviscosity, thus improving blood rheological properties and tissue irrigation. These effects allow to correct capillary dysfunctions either of functional origin or caused by constitutional or acquired metabolic disorders. Calcium dobesilate contributes to reduce edema.
DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION The daily recommended dosage for Doxium is usually 1 or 2 500mg capsules and taken at the same time as eating a meal. The treatment duration can vary from two weeks to two months depending on the seriousness of the illness. Dosage is tailored by the doctor to match the specific individual.
INGREDIENTS Each Doxium capsule contains calcium dobesilate monohydrate 500 mg.

entry.g:title: TEMPOL PARACETAMOL 500MG TABLET 10S
entry.g:description:
This medicine contains paracetamol. It belongs to a group of medicines called analgesics (painkillers) and is used to treat pain (including headache, toothache, back and period pain) and cold or flu symptoms.
Do not take paracetamol and tell your doctor if:
You are allergic to the active substance or any of the other ingredients in your medicine (listed in Section 6). Signs of an allergic reaction include a rash and breathing problems. There can also be swelling of the legs, arms, face, throat or tongue
Children
Paracetamol 500mg Tablets must not be given to children under 10 years of age.
Do not take paracetamol if any of the above apply to you. If you are not sure, talk to your doctor or pharmacist before taking paracetamol.

entry.g:title: Surgical Spirit Isopropyl Alcohol IPA 75% Disinfectant 免洗医疗消毒酒精液 4000 ml
entry.g:description:
MAX 4 BOTTLES PER ORDER IPA 75% 4 liter
CDC Guideline for Disinfection and Sterilization in Healthcare Facilities (2008)
Usage Instruction
Wash hand thoroughly with soap and water, wipe the hands before spraying the surgical spirit.
If water or soap is not available, spray directly onto the hand / surface to be treated, and wait for it to dry.
CDC Guideline for Disinfection and Sterilization in Healthcare Facilities (2008)
Ethanol
Isopropyl Alcohol & Ethyl alcohol, at concentrations of 60%–80%, is a potent virucidal agent inactivating all of the lipophilic viruses (e.g., herpes, vaccinia, and influenza virus) and many hydrophilic viruses (e.g., adenovirus, enterovirus, rhinovirus, and rotaviruses but not hepatitis A virus (HAV) 58 or poliovirus) 49. Isopropyl alcohol is not active against the nonlipid enteroviruses but is fully active against the lipid viruses 72. Studies also have demonstrated the ability of ethyl and isopropyl alcohol to inactivate the hepatitis B virus(HBV) 224, 225 and the herpes virus, 490 and ethyl alcohol to inactivate human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) 227, rotavirus, echovirus, and astrovirus 491.
Microbicidal Activity
Methyl alcohol (methanol) has the weakest bactericidal action of the alcohols and thus seldom is used in healthcare 488. The bactericidal activity of various concentrations of ethyl alcohol (ethanol) was examined against a variety of microorganisms in exposure periods ranging from 10 seconds to 1 hour 483. Pseudomonas aeruginosa was killed in 10 seconds by all concentrations of ethanol from 30% to 100% (v/v), and Serratia marcescens, E, coli and Salmonella typhosa were killed in 10 seconds by all concentrations of ethanol from 40% to 100%. The gram-positive organisms Staphylococcus aureus and Streptococcus pyogenes were slightly more resistant, being killed in 10 seconds by ethyl alcohol concentrations of 60%–95%. Isopropyl alcohol (isopropanol) was slightly more bactericidal than ethyl alcohol for E. coli and S. aureus 489.
Ethyl alcohol, at concentrations of 60%–80%, is a potent virucidal agent inactivating all of the lipophilic viruses (e.g., herpes, vaccinia, and influenza virus) and many hydrophilic viruses (e.g., adenovirus, enterovirus, rhinovirus, and rotaviruses but not hepatitis A virus (HAV) 58 or poliovirus) 49. Isopropyl alcohol is not active against the nonlipid enteroviruses but is fully active against the lipid viruses 72. Studies also have demonstrated the ability of ethyl and isopropyl alcohol to inactivate the hepatitis B virus(HBV) 224, 225 and the herpes virus, 490 and ethyl alcohol to inactivate human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) 227, rotavirus, echovirus, and astrovirus 491.
https://www.cdc.gov/infectioncontrol/guidelines/disinfection/disinfection-methods/chemical.html

entry.g:description:
NEW STOCK - REDUCED PRICE A Convenient, Effective, Safe and Economical Disinfection Sanitization Package for indoor and vehicle disinfection and purification. Warranty: 3 months, exclude delivery charges)
A.Multifunctional Atomization Disinfection Sanitizer machine.
E.M CAN SEND with the DIY BZK88 solution
Disinfectant: to be used water-based disinfectant.
Step by step usage guide. 1. Turn on the power supply. 2.Press the dual switch towards I, and wait for the indicator lamp at the handle to light up. 3.Put in the disinfectant solution. 4.Adjust the time of atomization fogging. Max 5 minutes. 5.The machine will start to operate. 6.After completion of the fogging, wait for 10 minutes for the disinfection to complete. 7.Switch off the power supply, and disconnect the power cable. 8.Clean the machine by fogging with clean water. For this process activate the cleaning by pressing the dual switch to position II. 9.After completion press the dual switch to the centre “O” position. Store the machine in a clean dry place. Notes: 1.For indoor use. Close all windows and doors before starting the disinfection. Leave the doors and window closed for at least 10 minutes for the disinfectant to kill the viruses and bacteria. 2.Open the doors and windows after 10 minutes for ventilation to clear the air. 3.For vehicles disinfection. Similar 10 minutes closed door disinfection time is needed. 4.After disinfection open all doors for fresh air exchange to take place. 5.Be sure to use proven effective and safe water-based disinfectants. 6.Know what you are using. The active ingredients should be clearly stated on the label. B.BZK88 Disinfectant Sanitization Solution. The active ingredient is Bezalkonium Chloride 0.08%. It is a NON ALCOHOL ready to use SANITIZER solution for fogging and spraying. It is non-flammable, safe and effective.
BZK As a Bioactive agents Especially for its antimicrobial activity, benzalkonium chloride is an active ingredient in many CONSUMER products: >Pharmaceutical products such as eye, ear and nasal drops or sprays, as a preservative >Personal care products such as hand sanitizers, wet wipes, shampoos, soaps, deodorants and cosmetics >Skin antiseptics and wound wash sprays, such as Bactine.[4][5] >Throat lozenges[6] and mouthwashes, as a biocide >Spermicidal creams >Over-the-counter single-application treatments for herpes, cold-sores, and fever blisters, such as RELEEV and Viroxyn >Burn and ulcer treatment >Spray disinfectants for hard surface sanitization >Cleaners for floor and hard surfaces as a disinfectant, such as Lysol and Dettol antibacterial spray and wipes. >Algaecides for clearing of algae, moss, lichens from paths, roof tiles, swimming pools, masonry, etc.

entry.g:title: GAVISCON Double Action Liquid 150ML
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Dual relief from heartburn and stomachache caused by excessive gastric acid.
-Gets to work instantly as quick as 3 minutes
-4 times more effective than antacids
-Suitable for use in pregnancy and breastfeeding mums
Gaviscon Double Action works in two ways to effectively relieve the discomfort brought by both heartburn and stomachache caused by excessive gastric acid:
1) Quickly neutralises excess stomach acid.
2) Its active ingredient Sodium Alginate forms a raft over the stomach contents which helps prevent acid coming back up into the oesophagus (food pipe).
DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION Shake well before use. Adults and children over 12 years: 10-20ml after meals and at bedtime. Children under 12 years: Seek your doctor's advice. If symptoms persist, consult your doctor.
INGREDIENTS Sodium Alginate, Calcium Carbonate, Sodium Bicarbonate.

entry.g:title: SIMEPAR LIVER TONIC Standardized Silymarin Capsule 40S EXP: 08/2021
entry.g:description: Contents: Silymarin 70 mg, vit B1 4 mg, vit B2 4 mg, vit B6 4 mg, vit B12 1.2 mcg, nicotinamide 12 mg, Ca pantothenate 8 mg ndications / Uses Toxic & inflammatory liver disorders. Adjuvant in chronic liver disease. ~The silymarin contained in Simepar was first isolated in 1959 by B. Janiak and R. Haensel from Our Lady's Thistle (Carduus marianus), a medicinal plant which has been known for >2000 years. The therapeutic action of Simepar is based on its effect on the permeability of the liver cell membrane and on the excretory and metabolic function of the liver. ~The specific vitamins of the B-complex form a functional unit in the intermediate metabolism. Experiments have shown them to exert a protective effect on the liver through their enzymatic influence on protein and carbohydrate metabolism. They accelerate the reparation of damaged liver parenchyma, and thus promote the organ's detoxifying action. Moreover, the vitamin B-complex content in the case of hepatopathy is greatly reduced due to a loss of the storage capacity of the tissue. Such deficiencies are compensated by the administration of the B-complex vitamins contained in Simepar.

entry.g:title: DULCOLAX SUPPOSITORY 5MG FOR CHILDREN 6S
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION DULCOLAX Suppositories contain a medicine called bisacodyl. This belongs to a group of medicines called laxatives. • DULCOLAX Suppositories are used for the short-term relief from occasional constipation • This medicine does not help with weight loss • DULCOLAX Suppositories are also used in hospitals to clear the bowel before surgery, X-rays or other tests • DULCOLAX Suppositories stimulate the muscles of the bowel (large intestine). They have a laxative effect usually within 10 to 30 minutes
DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION To treat constipation, one suppository should be unwrapped and inserted into the back passage. It will produce an effect within half an hour. Only use one suppository per day.
To empty the bowel before a medical procedure, your doctor will ask you to take bisacodyl tablets the night before the procedure, and then use a suppository the morning of the procedure. Follow the instructions given by your doctor. Don't use bisacodyl suppositories on a continuous basis for more than five days unless prescribed by your doctor. If you find you need to use a laxative every day you should consult your doctor so that the cause of your constipation can be investigated.
INGREDIENTS Active ingredient in this medicine: bisacodyl

entry.g:title: ZENTEL TABLET Albendazole 200mg UBAT CACING DEWORM 驱虫蛔虫 药片 2 Tablets EXP:11/2022
entry.g:description: EXP:11/2022 ZENTEL™ Albendazole Read all of this leaflet carefully before you start taking this medicine. WHAT IS IN THIS MEDICINE Each Tablet containing 200 mg albendazole. 2 tablet per box. 4 % w/v suspension to be taken orally; 4 g albendazole per 100 ml. WHAT ZENTEL IS AND WHAT IT IS USED FOR ZENTEL is a benzimidazole carbamate with anthelmintic and antiprotozoal activity against the intestinal and tissue worm infections. ZENTEL is used for the treatment of common worm infections of the gut, such as the following conditions caused by sensitive intestinal helminths/protozoa: - Pinworm infection (enterobiasis) - Hookworm disease (ancylostomiasis and necatoriasis) - Dwarf tapeworm infection (hymenolepsiasis) - Pork/beef tapeworm infections (taeniasis) - Threadworm infection (strongyloidiasis) - Roundworm infection (ascariasis) - Whipworm infection (trichuriasis) - Liver fluke infections (clonorchiasis and opisthorchiasis) - Hookworm (animal origin) causing skin disease (cutaneous larva migrans) - Giardia infection (giardiasis in children) HOW TO TAKE ZENTEL The recommended dose of ZENTEL is as follows: Adults and children over 2 years of age 400 mg as a single dose. Children 1-2 years of age 200 mg as a single dose. ZENTEL should not to be used in children aged under 1 year. No special procedures, such as fasting or purging, are required. If the patient is still symptomatic after a single course of treatment, they must consult a Healthcare Professional for further treatment. The maximum duration of treatment will vary according to your condition. Please refer to the table below for information on maximum doses for each condition. Do not exceed the maximum daily doses and treatment durations recommended. Some people, particularly young children, may experience difficulties swallowing the tablets whole and should be encouraged to chew the tablets with a little water; alternatively the tablets may be crushed. The suspension can also be administered as an alternative. * In order to obtain a complete cure in the case of pin-worm infestation, measures should be taken to maintain strict hygiene. Relatives and individuals sharing the same housing should also take a course of treatment. **In cases of proven dwarf tapeworm infection (Hymenolepiasis), a repeat course of the medicine in 10- 21 days is recommended. ***Advice should be sought from your Healthcare Professional 1 month after treatment to confirm fluke eradication. • Elderly Elderly patients with hepatic impairment (liver problems) must seek advice from a Healthcare Professional before taking this medicine. • Renal Impairment (Kidney problems) Page 3 of 5 If you have been diagnosed with renal impairment (kidney problems), seek advice from a Healthcare Professional before taking this medicine. • Hepatic Impairment (Liver problems) If you have been diagnosed with hepatic impairment (liver problems), seek advice from a Healthcare Professional before taking this medicine. entry.g:description:
Misai Kucing is a medicinal herb found mainly throughout South East Asia and tropical Australia which can grow to a height of 1.5m. Misai Kuching is also known as Kumis kucing, Javatee, Lamiaceae, Indisher Nierentee, Feuilles de Barbiflore, Java Tea, Kidney Tea, KoemisKoetjing and Yaa Nuat MaeoIn Malaysia, it is popularly known as Misai Kucing in lay man’s term. The reason the plant is named Misai Kucing (Cat’s whiskers) is because of its flower’s fine filaments that resembles cat’s whiskers.
Benefits:
No additive No preservative No Coloring Misai Kucing is able to treat the following conditions effectively;
Kidney stones. It is very useful for flushing the kidneys and urinary tract. It also relieves spasms of the smooth muscle in the walls of the internal organs, making it valuable for gallbladder problems. Urinary tract infections. Misai Kucing has the anti-bacterial and anti-fungalproperties. Thus, drinking Misai Kucing tea is able to treat urinary tract infections. Rheumatism and gout. Rheumatism and gout are the bane of many elderly in this modern age due to increased meat/protein consumption and a sedentary life. These conditions involve a build-up of acid and metabolic wastes within the muscles and joints. This leads to reduced circulation around joint which results in painful swelling in addition, in time may lead to joint destruction. By consuming Misai Kucing, it is able to help to remove the metabolic waster from our body and thus relieving rheumatism. Circulatory disorders. Misai Kucing is the remedy for blood vessels and circulatory problems. Diabetes. Misai Kucing is able to help to stabilize a diabetic’s sugar levels. High blood pressure. Misai Kucing inhibits blood platelet from sticking together. It is also used to reduce cholesterol and high blood pressure. Inflamation. Misai Kucing has anti inflammatory and anti alergic properties that can help to reduceswelling. Besides, Misai Kucing is also rich in antioxidant that is important to protect cells from the damaging effects of free radicals. Directions of Use:
Steep tea sachet in hot water cup for 5 minutes. Best taken hot and unsweetened. One tea sachet can make up to 1000ml or 4 cups of tea. Storage Information:
Once opened, store in cool dry place.

Why Sunaroma™ Stevia White Coffee 3in1:
Due to lifestyles, a lot of people really enjoy 3in1 coffee. The problem with some of them is that their health issues, and they need to cut the amount of sugar from their daily consumption. As a pharmacy group that committed to a greater health, we decided to come out with SUNAROMA™ STEVIA WHITE COFFEE 3IN1.
To achieve this, the coffee must meet our stringent approaches in the preparation of the coffee:
it must be Premium Arabica beans; we only want the best beans. Trying our coffee and you know how good and strong aroma of our coffee. We insist of Stevia as a replacement of sugar. Knowing our customers come from all walk of life, you can have this coffee even you do not have health issues. We add some skimmed milk, so that your coffee will not have flat taste, unlike most popular 3 in 1 coffee outside. It must be 35gm per packet of coffee. If you want to drink coffee, size does matters. Finally, our pharmacists should try the coffee before we sell it. This is to make sure it meets our standard. Direction:
Just drink 1 packet or 2 packets per day, and you will love the taste and aroma.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION: Live-well MECOMIN contains mecobalamin、 the neurologically-active form of Vitamin B12 vital to the central and peripher system. With mecobalamin、 the liver is able to skip the conversion of the inactive form of B12、 cyanocobalamin to mecobalamin as it is already orally active. Mecobalamin protects against neurological (nerve) disease and has the ability to regenerate damaged nerves in people (especially diabetics) with peripher amage. Diabetics and pre-diabetics are advised to supplement with mecobalamin as they are most prone to peripher amage. If nerve damage is left untreated for an extended period、 diabetics face a higher risk of leg amputations. Taking Live-well MECOMIN daily helps to also protect against the degeneration process of the nervous system and promote healthy nerves.
OVERVIEW: "Facts on Diabetes & Nerve Damage:
1 in 7 adult Malaysians is Diabetic About 60-70% of people with diabetes have some form of nerve damage The risk of a leg amputation is 27.7 times greater for a person with diabetes 50% of all amputations occur in people with diabetes
WHO WILL BENEFIT Diabetics Pre-Diabetics Those suffering from Pernicious Aneamia Vegetarians
USAGE Helps regenerate damaged nerves Promotes healthy nerves Protects against degeneration process of the nervous system Reduces nerve pain from diabetes"
INGREDIENTS: "Mecobalamin(the neurologically-active form of vitamin B12 vital to the peripheral nervous system)
Live-well MECOMIN is orally active and thus need not be converted from the inactive form, cyanobalamin to its active form, mecobalamin.
Suitable for Diabetics and pre-diabetics (more prone to peripheral nerve damage.

entry.g:title: ALBOTHYL VAGINAL SUPPOSITORIES 6s (EXP : 10/2021)
entry.g:description:
Albothyl vaginal suppositories are a drug from the group of gynecological anti-infective medications and antiseptics. They are used in the treatment of cervical erosion, vaginal and cervical vaginitis (an inflammation of the vagina), cervicitis, bacterial vaginosis (common vaginal infection). Albothyl suppository contains an active ingredient called policresulen. Precautions: They should be avoided or may be used only with extra precautions in the following conditions: 1. If you are allergic to Albothyl, policresulen or any other similar drug. Allergy symptoms are: 2. skin rash, 3. itching of the skin, 4. redness of the skin, 5. swelling of the face, 6. swelling of the neck, 7. swelling of the tongue, 8. difficulty breathing. Allergies can cause anaphylactic shock, that may be fatal. If you notice any symptoms of allergies, contact your doctor immediately. 9. If you have your menstrual period. In this period you should avoid the use of vaginal suppositories. 10. NOT to be used during Pregnancy or Breast-feeding. 11. It is NOT recommended for use in patients under the age of 18 years and postmenopausal women. 12. Avoid sexual intercourse for 7 days after using Albothyl vaginal suppositories. *** These suppositories can cause ejection of damaged, dead tissue from the vagina, and it is necessary to wear pads to avoid irritating the vagina.
How to use Albothyl suppository: Albothyl vaginal suppositories are usually applied in the following doses: 1 vaginal suppository every other day for 7-14 days. They are intended for use in vagina. It is best to apply Albothyl vaginal suppositories at bedtime, in order to avoid fallout of suppositories. Vaginal suppositories can slightly be moistened with water, to make them easier to retract into the vagina.
Side effects: This medicine can cause the following side effects: -feeling of a foreign body in the uterus, -discomfort in the lower abdomen, -vaginal irritation, -vaginal dryness and allergic reactions. Symptoms of an allergic reaction include: -skin rash, -itching, -redness, -swelling of the face, -neck swelling, -tongue swelling, -difficulty breathing. An allergic reaction can cause anaphylactic shock that can be fatal. *** Information on this website are provided for educational purposes only and are not intended for medical advice, diagnosis or treatment.

entry.g:title: ALICES LOTION anti kutu 60ML ( EXP : 11/2022 )
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
A-LICES Shampoo is used for the treatment and eradication of head lice, body lice and their eggs.
CAUTION Do not use A-LICES Shampoo: If you are allergic to Malathion or to any of the other ingredients; To treat infants less than 6 months old, except on medical advice.
You must tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are pregnant or breast-feeding.
Adults, Children and Infants aged 6 months and over:
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION
For head lice - Wet hair and apply sufficient amount of shampoo to the roots of the hair and scalp, working up a rich lather. Pay special attention to partings, the back of the neck and around the ears. Leave application on for at least 10 minutes before rinsing. Comb the hair (whilst wet) with a fine tooth comb to remove dead lice and eggs (nits). A second application is recommended a week after the first application. Bedding, comb, cap, towel, and clothing should also be washed to prevent re-infection. Avoid contact with any infected persons.
For pubic lice - Wet the area and apply directly to pubic hair, hair between the legs and surrounding the anus. Completely cover the skin and hair with the shampoo and work up a rich lather. Leave application on for at least 10 minutes before rinsing. Remove dead lice and eggs (nits) with a fine comb. A second application is recommended a week after the first application.
Bedding, comb, towel, and clothing should be washed to prevent re-infection. Avoid contact with infected persons.
INGREDIENTS
Active Ingredient: Malathion 1%
Medicines have benefits and some have risks. Always read the label carefully and use strictly as directed.

entry.g:title: ZENTEL Suspension Albendazole 400mg/10ml ubat cacing deworm 驱虫蛔虫药水 10ML EXP:11/2022
entry.g:description: EXP:11/2022 ZENTEL™ Albendazole Read all of this leaflet carefully before you start taking this medicine. WHAT IS IN THIS MEDICINE Tablet containing 200 mg or 400 mg albendazole. 4 % w/v suspension to be taken orally; 4 g albendazole per 100 ml. WHAT ZENTEL IS AND WHAT IT IS USED FOR ZENTEL is a benzimidazole carbamate with anthelmintic and antiprotozoal activity against the intestinal and tissue worm infections. ZENTEL is used for the treatment of common worm infections of the gut, such as the following conditions caused by sensitive intestinal helminths/protozoa: - Pinworm infection (enterobiasis) - Hookworm disease (ancylostomiasis and necatoriasis) - Dwarf tapeworm infection (hymenolepsiasis) - Pork/beef tapeworm infections (taeniasis) - Threadworm infection (strongyloidiasis) - Roundworm infection (ascariasis) - Whipworm infection (trichuriasis) - Liver fluke infections (clonorchiasis and opisthorchiasis) - Hookworm (animal origin) causing skin disease (cutaneous larva migrans) - Giardia infection (giardiasis in children) HOW TO TAKE ZENTEL The recommended dose of ZENTEL is as follows: Adults and children over 2 years of age 400 mg as a single dose. Children 1-2 years of age 200 mg as a single dose. ZENTEL should not to be used in children aged under 1 year. No special procedures, such as fasting or purging, are required. If the patient is still symptomatic after a single course of treatment, they must consult a Healthcare Professional for further treatment. The maximum duration of treatment will vary according to your condition. Please refer to the table below for information on maximum doses for each condition. Do not exceed the maximum daily doses and treatment durations recommended. Some people, particularly young children, may experience difficulties swallowing the tablets whole and should be encouraged to chew the tablets with a little water; alternatively the tablets may be crushed. The suspension can also be administered as an alternative. * In order to obtain a complete cure in the case of pin-worm infestation, measures should be taken to maintain strict hygiene. Relatives and individuals sharing the same housing should also take a course of treatment. **In cases of proven dwarf tapeworm infection (Hymenolepiasis), a repeat course of the medicine in 10- 21 days is recommended. ***Advice should be sought from your Healthcare Professional 1 month after treatment to confirm fluke eradication. • Elderly Elderly patients with hepatic impairment (liver problems) must seek advice from a Healthcare Professional before taking this medicine. • Renal Impairment (Kidney problems) Page 3 of 5 If you have been diagnosed with renal impairment (kidney problems), seek advice from a Healthcare Professional before taking this medicine. • Hepatic Impairment (Liver problems) If you have been diagnosed with hepatic impairment (liver problems), seek advice from a Healthcare Professional before taking this medicine. DON’T TAKE ZENTEL If you are pregnant.

entry.g:title: ADVANCE PHARMA Conart Glucosamine sulphate 250 mg, chondroitin sulphate 200 mg 60s capsules
entry.g:description:
MAL 07091058X
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION: Glucosamine and chondroitin sulfate are believed to impact the cartilage degeneration process of osteoarthritis in the following ways: Glucosamine sulfate is thought to help with cartilage formation and repair. Some laboratory tests show that glucosamine sulfate may help protect joint cartilage by limiting breakdown and helping to build up levels of cartilage. Chondroitin sulfate is part of a protein molecule that helps give cartilage its elastic properties and is thought to have an anti-inflammatory effect, which can help to reduce the painful swelling in the joints that occurs when the exposed bones in the joint rub together. In addition, chondroitin sulfate may also help reduce the breakdown of cartilage and help restore cartilage growth to better cushion the joints.
OVERVIEW:
"Contents
Per cap Glucosamine sulphate 250 mg, chondroitin sulphate 200 mg. Indications
Adjunctive treatment of Osteoarthritis Contraindications
Hypersensitivity to shellfish. Special Precautions
Diabetes, obese patients. Children, pregnancy & lactation Packaging
Amber glass bottle contains 60 capsules"
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION: "Mild or moderate Osteoarthritis: 2 capsules twice a day for at least 6 wk. Severe Osteoarthritis: Initially 2 capsules 3 times a day for at least 8 wk, followed by 2 capsules twice a day for 3-4 mth Should be taken with food. Best taken before meals."
INGREDIENTS: Glucosamine sulphate 250mg and chondroitin sulfate 200mg

entry.g:title: DUODERM HYDROACTIVE GEL 15g x 1 tube ( EXP : 04/2022 )
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION DuoDERM® Hydroactive® Gel is a clear, preservative-free, viscous hydrogel.
It is indicated for the management of partial and full-thickess wounds, ideally as a filler for dry cavity wounds to provide a moist healing environment that is supportive process by aiding autolytic debridement and allowing non traumatic removal of secondary dresing without damaging newly formed tissue.
It has been designed to be used for pressure sores, leg ulcers, and diabetic ulcers.
DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION 1. Cleanse the wound site, rinse well and dry the surrounding skin. 2 Unscrew the tube cap and remove the white safety ring. 3. Replace the cap to puncture the tube membrane. 4. Apply DuoDERM Gel directly into the wound. Do not fill the wound beyond the level of the surrounding skin. 5. DuoDERM Gel should be changed when the cover dressing leaks or is removed for routine dressing changes.
Maximum recommended wear time is seven days.
Storage: Up to 25°C; avoid freezing.

entry.g:title: APPETON ACTIV-C 100MG BLACKCURRANT 60S EXP:08/2022
entry.g:description:
Appeton Activ-C promotes stronger body resistance toward infection. Most mothers are worried that their child will get sick, hence might not be able to enjoy themselves at school or during their play time. Therefore, it is useful for mothers to give vitamin C to the children to increase their bodies’ defense level so they won’t fall sick.
Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) is a water soluble vitamin which is necessary in the body to form collagen in bones, cartilage, muscle and blood vessels. It also aids in the absorption of iron in our body.
• Helps to promote body resistance towards infection and reduce the duration of flu • Prevent common cold and losing teeth and prevent scurvy • As an antioxidant to prevent cancer and involve in making collagen as a structure in tissue • Reduces wheezing symptoms associated with asthma and helps in absorption of Iron. Product Details
Features
• Chewable tablets in star shapes. • Comes in orange, blackcurrant and strawberry flavours. • Contains no saccharin. Dosage
• 1 – 3 tablets per day.
Ingredients
Vitamin C 100mg

entry.g:title: K-Y LUBRICATING JELLY 50G EXP:10-2022
entry.g:description:
EXP:10-2022 PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Durex K-Y Jelly Personal Lubricant is clear, non-greasy and water soluble. Ideal for use with condoms. There are times when you need relief from the dryness that is caused by your body not producing enough of its own lubrication. Durex K-Y Jelly is recommended to help enhance your natural lubrication. Durex K-Y is a moist, colourless, odourless, non-greasy gel that eliminates friction discomfort and helps protect you from irritation.Durex K-Y Jelly is ideal for use with condoms. Oil based products such as petroleum jelly and some hand and body lotions can destroy the latex in condoms in seconds, leading to possible leakage.Like your body's own lubrication, Durex K-Y Jelly is water-based, so it is clean rinsing and won't remain in the body like petroleum jelly can. Think of Durex K-Y Jelly as the closest thing to your body's own natural lubrication.
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION If irritation develops, consult your physician. This product is not a contraceptive and does not contain a spermicide. There are no ingredients in this product which will cause dependency.
INGREDIENTS Chlorhexidine Gluconate and Methyl Hydroxybenzoate
WARNINGS Do not use if seals over carton ends are missing or broken. Do not use if foil seal on the tube is broken or missing.

entry.g:title: ACCU-CHEK PERFORMA TEST STRIPS 25s (EXP : 05/2022)
entry.g:description:
Features:
- 6 gold electrodes: The test strip electrodes work with the system technology and code key to perform extensive quality checks such as strip integrity checks prior to each test - so fast you do not even realize it.
- Temperature and humidity compensation: The Accu-Chek Performa test strip adjusts to heat, cold and humidity to ensure accurate measuring.
- Tiny blood sample: Accu-Chek Performa test strips only require a tiny 0.6 micro litre sample for a blood glucose measurement. This makes lancing less painful as you can use a lower penetration depth. Furthermore, a smaller blood sample reduces the likelihood of under-dosing.
- Re-dosing capability: The system indicates if more blood is needed and permits re-dosing within 5 seconds.
- Fast capillary fill: The strip uses a super-fast-fill capillary window which acts like a funnel to help draw blood into the strip quickly, making dosing more convenient for the user.
- Y-capillary: The strips wide Y-capillary allows easier targeting of the sample, which is particularly important for patients with dexterity problems.
