entry.g:title: LIVE-WELL LIVE WELL OSTESAMIN & CONDROITIN (3X100S) FOC MSM (150S) #
entry.g:description:
MAL07091060X / MAL09051454X
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION: The Trusted & Effective 2-in-1 Glucosamine + Chondroitin Formula to Relieve Joint Pains & Osteoarthritis Live-well OsteSAMIN plus Chondroitin contains the synergistic joint health nutrients, Glucosamine and Chondroitin Sulphate - which are compounds naturally found in our body but their production declines as we age. An insufficient supply of Glucosamine and Chondroitin restricts the efficiency of cartilage rebuilding and can delay repair of cartilage and other connective tissues. Osteoarthritis is a chronic condition characterised by the breakdown of the joint cartilage. Cartilage is the part of the joint that cushions the ends of the bones and allows easy movement of joints. Most joint pains are caused by ageing. The cartilage in the joint is important because it allows the joints to move smoothly and helps prevent friction between joints. People suffering from osteoarthritis will find themselves in a situation where their joint cartilage regrowth is unable to keep up with the rate of wear and tear. When the joint cartilage wears out, it causes pain, inflammation and swelling. With Live-well OsteSAMIN plus Chondroitin aging adults can now lead a life free from joint pains to enjoy their favourite activities - travelling, exercising, playing with kids, dining out, shopping etc. Take Live-well OsteSAMIN plus Chondroitin together with Live-well OsteMSM daily to treat osteoarthritis & relief joint pains for greater mobility and flexibility. WHO WILL BENEFIT Those suffering from moderate-to-severe Osteoarthritis (OA) - especially of the knee USAGE Relieves joint pains Treats osteoarthritis Reduces stiffness Reduces inflammation Rebuilds and repair cartilage Lubricates joints Promotes healthy joints Increases mobility Improves flexibility
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION: For mild Osteoarthritis:For moderate to severe Osteoarthritis:For maintenance: 1 capsule twice daily (at least 2-3 months), 15 minutes before meals 2 capsules twice daily (at least 2-3 months), 15 minutes before meals 1 capsule twice daily, 15 minutes before meals
INGREDIENTS: Active Ingredients Per Capsule Strength Glucosamine Sulphate Potassium Chloride (Sodium-free) 375 mg Chondroitin Sulphate 200 mg

entry.g:title: LIVE-WELL Live Well UTIPURE URINARY ALKALINIZER 9s EXP:09/2021
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION: "The Trusted Urinary Alkalinizer for Women to Relieve Painful Urination and Treat UTI Conditions
Urinary tract infection (UTI) is an infection in any part of the urinary system - kidneys, ureters, bladder and urethra. Anyone can get a urinary tract infection, but it is more common in women. In fact, women are four times more likely to get a UTI than men. The lifetime risk of getting a UTI as a woman is greater than 50%.
UTI causes the urine to become acidic resulting in a burning sensation during urination - which can be painful and uncomfortable. UTIpure is a urinary alkalinizer that helps relieve symptoms of UTI such as:
Burning sensation when urinating Painful urination Frequent urge to urinate Incomplete emptying of the bladder sensation Cloudy or reddish urine* Foul-smelling urine*
*When taken in combination with antibiotics
UTIpure works to effectively relieve UTI symptoms in the following ways:
Neutralizing the acidity of urine - UTIpure makes the urine more alkaline (less acidic), which alleviates the discomfort caused by acidic urine. Alkalinizing urine also helps to hinder bacteria growth Enhancing the action of antibiotics against bacteria by providing an alkaline pH environment As an adjunct to antibiotic treatment for UTI Each 4g sachet of UTIpure makes a pleasant lime-flavored effervescent drink for the relief of UTI symptoms caused by bacteria. UTIpure is also suitable for those concerned about sugar or artificial sweeteners since UTIpure does not contain any sugar or artificial sweeteners (i.e. saccharin, aspartame etc.)."
OVERVIEW: "Burning sensation when urinating Painful urination Frequent urge to urinate Incomplete emptying of the bladder sensation Cloudy or reddish urine* Foul-smelling urine* 100% Original High Quality Sold by Farmasi Lee MS"
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION: "Take 4g to 8g (1 to 2 sachets) dissolved in cold water four times daily for 5 days or as directed by the physician.
将4至8克（1至2小袋）粉加入一杯冷开水。每天4次，维持5天或根据医生的指示。"
INGREDIENTS: "Each 4g sachet contains: Sodium bicarbonate 1760mg Sodium citrate anhydrous 630mg Citric acid anhydrous 720mg Tartaric acid 890mg "

entry.g:title: FUTURO KNEE SUPPORT ADJUSTABLE 09039 1s
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Whether you're training for your first marathon, or you've spiked your cycling mileage too quickly; when your knees have something to say, they aren't shy about saying it. Take the edge off and keep doing what you love with the help of the FUTURO™ Sport Adjustable Knee Stabilizer­. Designed to bring you customizable comfort, this knee brace is fully adjustable and features side stabilizers to help medial and lateral support. An open kneecap design enhances support to keep you focused on the finish line.–Wrap your knee in the supportive comfort of the FUTURO™ Sport Adjustable Knee Stabilizer­ and get out there.
Provides moderate-stabilizing compression to weak, sore muscles, and injured knees Side stabilizers reduce lateral motion for comfort Vented, wraparound style helps keep you cool Adjustable straps for customizable support Flexible design promotes a full range of motion Wear on either knee for versatility Ideal for stiff, weak, sore and injured knees Supported by our expert panel of engineers and medical professionals Size: Adjustable Color: Black Caution: Some individuals may be sensitive to neoprene or neoprene-blend rubber. If a rash develops, discontinue use and contact a physician
DIRECTIONS 1. Lay stabilizer over knee, smooth side against skin and with single strap to the outside of leg. Place round hole over kneecap. Wrap middle strap under knee and attach hook closure to the stabilizer. 2. Position elbow into pocket of support. Wrap each of the two remaining outside straps under knee and attach closures to the stabilizer. Adjust all straps until fit is firm, yet comfortable.
INGREDIENTS Cotton, Rubber, Nylon, Polyester, Spandex
Care Instructions Attach all closures before washing. Hand wash with mild soap in warm (not hot) water. Rinse well and air dry.
DO NOT: machine wash, tumble dry, dry clean, or use bleach or fabric softeners.

entry.g:title: AEROCHAMBER CHILD MASK
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION The only valved holding chamber (VHC) available with the Flow-Vu® indicator1 When patients have trouble using Metered Dose Inhalers (MDIs), the medication that the MDIs dispense may end up on the back of the throat or on the roof of the mouth.
AeroChamber Plus® Flow-Vu® Anti-Static Valved Holding Chamber (VHC) helps patients inhale MDI medications correctly. AeroChamber Plus® Flow-Vu® VHC is a device available by prescription only for patients who may have difficulty with the coordination and control involved in using MDIs correctly.
One Size Doesn’t Fit All Multiple mask sizes to fit patients of different ages
DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION
1. Carefully examine the product for damage, missing parts, or foreign objects. Remove any foreign objects prior to use. The product should be replaced IMMEDIATELY if there are any damaged or missing parts. If necessary, use the Metered Dose Inhaler (MDI) alone until a replacement is obtained. If the patient's symptoms worsen, please seek immediate medical attention.
2. Remove cap from the MDI.
3. Shake the MDI immediately before each use as per the instructions supplied with the MDI.
4. Insert the MDI into the backpiece of the chamber.
5. Apply mask to face and ensure an effective seal. The Flow-Vu® Inspiratory Flow Indicator (IFI) only moves if a good seal is created.
5. Press the MDI at the beginning of a slow inhalation as the Flow-Vu® Inspiratory Flow Indicator moves toward the patient. Use the Flow-Vu® Inspiratory Flow Indicator to count breaths. Maintain seal for 5-6 breaths after the MDI is pressed. Administer 1 puff at a time.
6. Follow instructions supplied with the MDI on how long to wait before repeating steps 3-6 as prescribed.

entry.g:description:
Hovid Ginkgo 80mg Ginkgo is extracted from the leaves of the Ginkgo biloba tree. Ginkgo has been traditionally used to improve blood circulation and boost brain functions, especially caused by aging.
Ginkgo is well known to help for Dementia and Alzheimer’s diseases, caused by reduced blood flow to the brain with symptoms like memory loss, headache, ringing in the ears, giddiness and dizziness.
Ginkgo is also often used to help relief leg pain when walking, cold and numb at toes and fingers, problems caused by blood circulation to the hands and legs. Usage recommendation:
1 tablet to be taken 3 times a day

Ginkgo Biloba Extract 80mg equivalent to 4000mg Ginkgo Biloba leaves

entry.g:title: EVIN SONIC TOOTHBRUSH
entry.g:description:
Evin Sonic Toothbrush is fitted with contoured DuPont brush to clean every tooth surface. Soft brush head combined with sonic stroking gently massage gums to keep them healthy. For best results, dentists recommend changing your toothbrush or brush head every 2-3months.
Advantages: 1. 22000 strokes per minute 2. Sonic cleaning and high efficienc 3. Replaceable brush head and battery 4. Slim and Non-slip design 5. Each refill heads can last for about 120 days (twice of 2mins perday) 7. Waterproof IPX 7 8. High quality DuPont brush promotes naturally whiter teeth by gently polishing off surface stains.
Operating Instructions: 1. Place a small amount of toothpaste on the head of toothbrush. 2. Press "On/Off" button to activate stroking action. 3. Brush teeth for 2-3 minutes. 4. Press "On/Off" button again to turn off unit. 5. Rinse brush head after each use. 6. To replace batteries, pull off battery cover from the base of toothbrush. Insert new battery into battery compartment and close tightly.

entry.g:description:
Features: • Great help and aid for immobile patients. • Suitable for bed ridden person in a hospital or at home. • Durable, strong, PP material. Smooth contoured comfortable edges. • Stable, supportive weight capacity certified up to 100kg. • Anti-Spill, reusable and fully autoclavable. • Easy to clean with standard household cleaners. • This bed pan fits people of all sizes from the most petite or child to a person of size.
Bed Pan is ideal for individuals who need to use bathroom facilities but cannot get out of bed
Description: • HOSPITAL-QUALITY BEDPAN: This potty is comfort, stability, and usability matter more than ever to patients, particularly the elderly. It suitable for the caretakers, nurses, or CNAs who are looking for hospital-grade bedpans.
• FOR BEDRIDDEN PATIENTS: When you’re working with someone who is bedbound, comfort is one of the most essential factors involved in their care. Quite often, these kinds of individuals aren’t able to make it to bathroom from their bed, thus this health accessory is comfortable and incredibly easy to use.
• COMFORTABLE & DURABLE EQUIPMENT: This large bedpan is made to be both comfortable and durable. Smooth, contoured edges make it easy to use when male or female patients need to pee or access the potty. It works just as well for kids as it does for adults.
• EASY TO CLEAN: As a caretaker, you are giving yourself a product that is easy to clean and that won’t splash or spill. This bedpan is designed with a special splash guard so that both you and your patient can stay clean and dignified.
• PORTABLE & CONVENIENT: Unlike other potty chairs, you can take this product on the go if you need to drive somewhere in your car or move from room to room.

entry.g:title: BIO OIL bio-oil Original 60ML MFG: 04-2019
entry.g:description:
MFG: 04-2019 PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Bio Oil is a specialist skincare treatment that is recommended for scars, stretch marks, uneven skin tone, ageing and dehydrated skin. It is formulated for use on both the face and body.
Bio Oil contains the breakthrough ingredient PurCellin Oil, Vitamins A and E, Chamomile extract and a combination of natural oils.
DIRECTIONS FOR USE Scars To help reduce the appearance of both new and old scars, massage regularly with Bio Oil. Apply to the scar 2 to 3 times daily, massaging gently with the fingertips in a circular motion. Do not use on broken skin.
Stretch Marks To help reduce the possibility of stretch marks forming during periods of rapid change, massage Bio Oil regularly into the areas most susceptible to stretch marks.
During pregnancy massage abdomen, hips, breasts and upper thighs once or twice daily from the early months of pregnancy. For abdominal massage, apply Bio Oil all over you abdomen. Using gentle fingertip pressure, massage upwards towards your navel then outwards over your hips. Continue for 5 minutes. Then, working downwards from your navel, gently massage sideways and upwards. Abdominal massage, combined with antenatal and postnatal exercises, will be of great benefit in toning your muscles after delivery.
Uneven Skin Tone To help achieve even skin tone, apply Bio oil twice daily to pigmentation marks, massaging with the fingertips in a circular motion.
Ageing Skin Regular Bio Oil massage treatment helps smooth and tone sagging and wrinkled skin by promoting the skin's elasticity.
Dehydrated Skin The skin's natural protective oil layer is constantly being stripped away by extreme weather, frequent hand-washing, bathing and showering and the drying effects of central heating or air conditioning. Bio Oil is especially effective in maintaining the skin's delicate moisture balance. Apply Bio Oil after bathing, showering, suntanning or swimming. Massage gently into skin, paying particular attention to dry or chapped areas.
INGREDIENTS Paraffinum Liquidum, Triisononanoin, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Isopropyl Myristate, Retinyl Palmitate (Vitamin A), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Lavandula Angustifolia, Rosmarinus Officinalis, Calendula Officinalis, Helianthus Annuus, Glycine Soja, BHT, Bisabolol, Parfum, CI 26100.
OIL USES Scars Helps reduce the appearance of both new and old scars.
Stretch Marks Helps reduce the possibility of stretch marks forming during periods of rapid change in body size, such as pregnancy, adolescence and weight loss. Helps reduce the appearance of existing stretch marks.
Uneven Skin Tone Helps reduce the appearance of pigmentation marks.
Ageing Skin Smoothes and tones sagging and wrinkled skin by promoting the skin's elasticity.
Dehydrated Skin Protects against the drying effects of water and climate; lubricates and relieves dry or chapped skin.
Daily Skincare * Specialist intensive moisturiser. * Soothing after-sun treatment. * Ideal as a bath

entry.g:title: FLUIMUCIL A200 SACHET 30S
entry.g:description:
Fluimucil A 200mg is a effervescent tablet. Each box contains 10 tablets.
Overview Fluimucil A is suitable for children and adults who have persistent cough with excessive phlegm associated with lung infections including acute and chronic bronchitis. Fluimucil clears phlegm and restores weakened lungs Ingredients N-acetylcysteine (NAC) Directions for Use Suitable for adult with persistent cough and phlegm, acute bronchitis or chronic bronchitis. Dissolve the effervescent tablet in a small glass of water, then drink the solution immediately after it is fully dissolved. Dosage Adult - 1 Fluimucil 200mg effervescent tablet a day. Contraindication Known hypersensitivity to acetylcysteine. As Fluimucil A contains aspartame, it is contraindicated in patients suffering from phenylketonuria. Contraindicated in children below 2 years of age Caution Patients suffering from bronchial asthma must be strictly controlled during the therapy: should bronchospasm occur, the treatment must immediately be stopped. Caution should be taken in patients suffering from or with a history of peptic ulcer. It is preferable not to mix other drugs with the Fluimucil A solution.

entry.g:title: FOLEY CATHETER 2 WAY STANDARD 14FR IDEALCARE
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
*Made of medical grade silicone-coated PVC *Smooth tip for atraumatic insertion *Soft retaining balloon *Thin walls ensure maximum flowrate *Used for in-dwelling, hemostasia or urethra cathetherisation *Also available in 100% silicone
Foley Catheterization Procedure Female catheterization: The female urethra is short compared to the male urethra. It is located above the vagina in the pelvis. Insertion of the catheter is facilitated by having the patient lie down on his or her back with the buttocks at the edge of the examination table. Adequate exposure of the urethra is obtained by elevating and supporting the legs by stirrups or placing them in a frog-legged position. Finally, the labia are separated to expose the urethra. Male catheterization: The male urethra is long compared to the female urethra. A catheter is placed while lying down or in the frog-legged position. If there is a foreskin, it is retracted to its maximal limit. The doctor or medical assistant will insert the Foley catheter in this manner: The urethra and the surrounding areas are cleaned with a cotton-ball dipped in antiseptic solution. Beginning at the urethra, the cleansing is performed in a circular motion, moving outward to the surrounding areas. A Foley catheter, lubricated with water-soluble jelly, is inserted into the bladder through the urethra.
Once the catheter is passed, the balloon is in the bladder. It is then slowly inflated with about 10cc of water using a syringe. Inflating the balloon should not be painful. At this time, urine, if present in the bladder, should flow back through the catheter and into the sterile drainage bag.
The catheter balloon is deflated by inserting a syringe into the catheter valve and pulling back on the syringe. The pressure in the balloon will cause the water to flow into the syringe. Once the balloon is empty, the Foley catheter can be pulled out.

These could be signs of a serious condition *If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a health professional before use *Keep out of reach of children *In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away *Other Information Causes of Constipation. *Constipation can be caused by certain diet and lifestyle choices, as well as physiological changes and certain medications.
*Sometimes it is not always easy to anticipate what will cause constipation; and it is not always predictable. Below is a list of the more common constipation triggers.
*Diet (high fat and refined sugar, low in fiber) *Dehydration *Stress *Inactivity / Lack of exercise *Travel *Pregnancy *The normal aging process *Changes in your daily routine *Not using the bathroom when you have the urge to go *Commonly prescribed medications, vitamins, and dietary supplements

Size Guide
Product Size Waist Circumference
M 74 - 81 cm/ 25 - 28 In
L 81 - 89 cm/ 29 - 32 In
XL 89 - 97 cm/ 32 - 35 In
XXL 97 - 104 cm/35 - 38 In
How to use
Always read the product information before use. Position bottom of support at the waist. Pull the large left flap towards body and secure main fastener around waist/back. Again, tighten the main fastener by fastening the small left/right strap on top for extra support and stability. Check the support to make sure it is not uncomfortably tight and blood flow is not restricted. Store in a cool, dry place.
Directions for washing
Please wash it with your hands in tepid water. Please wash it with neutral detergent (avoid bleach). Please dry it in the shade.
Hazards and Cautions
Keep out of the sight and reach of children.
The above indications may not be suitable for your condition, always seek medical advice from your pharmacist/doctor before use. Pay attention on the correct sizing. Please do not pull severely to get strong compression and support. This is for strengthening and supporting weak muscle and please do not use it for other purposes. Avoid using on broken skin. Do not use if you have a known allergy to any of the specified materials. The product should be applied as directed. Ensure product is not uncomfortably tight and blood flow is not restricted. Avoid wearing for prolonged periods. If a rash develops, pain is prolonged or conditions worsen, discontinue use and consult a doctor

entry.g:title: NOXWORM SUSPENSION (CHOCOLATE) Mebendazole 200MG/5ML 10ML EXP: 10-2023
entry.g:description:
EXP: 10-2023
Common worms enter our body through 2 main ways: 1. contamination of food by worm eggs 2. penetration of our skin by worm larvae The incidence of worm varies in different countries from as high as 90% to as low as 5%. Incidence tends to be higher in areas where farming is widespread and untreated sewage is used as fertilisers. Children are particularly easy targets for common worm infections are being active, they are outdoors most of the time.
In Malaysia, the most common worm infection is whipworm, followed by roundworm, hookworm, pinworm and threadworm. Whipworm is one of the most difficult to kill. Because the soil conditions for the breeding these common worms' eggs (except pinworm) are rather similar, often a patient is infected with more than one type of worm at the same time. Therefore the deworming medicine chosen should preferably be one that can kill all types of common worms.
Noxworm can kill the difficult-to-treat whipworm. not all deworming medicines can do this. Noxworm can also kill all the other common worms. This means you do not have to take more than one type of deworming medicine to treat your worm infection. Noxworm (Mebendazole) kills both the larvae and the adult worm. Other deworming medicines only kill adult worms. If you use other deworming medicines, you have to take medicine again when the unkilled larvae mature into adult worms. With Noxworm, you do not have to. Noxworm has been successfully used on more than 5 million patients worldwide. Noxworm can be taken anytime of the day. No special fasting or purging procedure is required.

An insufficient supply of Glucosamine and Chondroitin restricts the efficiency of cartilage rebuilding and can delay repair of cartilage and other connective tissues. Osteoarthritis is a chronic condition characterised by the breakdown of the joint cartilage. Cartilage is the part of the joint that cushions the ends of the bones and allows easy movement of joints. Most joint pains are caused by ageing. The cartilage in the joint is important because it allows the joints to move smoothly and helps prevent friction between joints. People suffering from osteoarthritis will find themselves in a situation where their joint cartilage regrowth is unable to keep up with the rate of wear and tear. When the joint cartilage wears out, it causes pain, inflammation and swelling. With Live-well OsteSAMIN plus Chondroitin aging adults can now lead a life free from joint pains to enjoy their favourite activities - travelling, exercising, playing with kids, dining out, shopping etc. Take Live-well OsteSAMIN plus Chondroitin together with Live-well OsteMSM daily to treat osteoarthritis & relief joint pains for greater mobility and flexibility. entry.g:title: REMIFEMIN Tab Black Cohosh ext. 20mg 60S
entry.g:description:
Remifemin What is menopause?
Menopause marks the end of female fertility, with the cessation of ovulation and menstruation in a woman. With menopause, the ovaries stop producing the hormone estrogen, commonly known as the ‘female hormone’ as it is responsible for the feminine characteristics in women.
Menopause typically occurs between the ages of 47 and 55. Before menopause is confirmed, most women will start experiencing menopausal or climacteric symptoms such as:
~Hot flushes and profuse sweating
~Mood swings
~Troubled sleep patterns
~Vaginal dryness
~Headaches & dizziness
~Palpitations
Menopausal symptoms can be managed with various ways, a popular option being the Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT). However, HRT has been linked to increased risks of female conditions such as endometrial, ovarian and breast cancers over the last few years. This has resulted in many women resorting to alternative and natural therapies such as Dong Quai, black cohosh, red clover and soy, in the recent years for menopausal relief.
All these herbs have been used for generations since ancient times by women to reduce or relieve menopausal complaints for a better quality of life. Scientific innovations have now making these herbs available in easy-to-consume and hygienic form for modern women.
Apart from supplements, it also helps to practise a healthy lifestyle when undergoing menopause. Here are some tips:
~Maintain a balanced diet –take less salt and fats, especially those hidden in processed foods.
~Learn to relax and unwind- avoid overstressing yourself with work.
~Exercise more, as it keeps your weight down and releases endorphins, the happy hormone, in your brain.
~Stop smoking and avoid excessive caffeinated drinks.
~Take calcium and vitamin D daily for optimum bone health.
~Visit your gynecologist for regular check-ups.
~Stay active in social activities or learn a new hobby.
~Spend more time with friends and family.
~Keep a positive outlook on life.
~Take omega –3 supplements to protect against increased risks of heart disease and maintain healthy cholesterol levels.

The patented bi-layer caplet starts to release one layer straight away for fast pain relief, while the second layer is released slowly over a period to give long-lasting relief. This means longer lasting back and pain relief than ordinary Panadol, with the improved convenience of fewer doses. And you can rest assured it won’t harm your stomach. entry.g:description:
Impact Music and Concert Ear Plugs are special-purpose hearing protectors designed to allow low level sounds that aren’t harmful to hearing to pass through and reach the ear canals, while blocking out loud, dangerous noises.
Because Impact ear plugs let safe sounds pass through with little attenuation, these earplugs are excellent for music listening at clubs and concerts, as well as for general use around the home and shop.
With Impact ear plugs in place, you can still hear quite well, but when a sudden spike in sound level strikes the valve body inside the ear plugs, the acoustic valve closes instantly, preventing the dangerous sound waves from entering your ear.
Impact Noise Reducing Ear Plug Features: + Improves listening pleasure by freely allowing safe sound levels to enter your ear. + Vented to eliminates the ‘plugged up’ feeling common with solid earplugs. + By automatically closing when struck by a dangerous sound wave, the internal acoustic valves eliminate the pain that can come from loud impact music. + 31NRR, which means safe sounds pass through the valve with little distortion.

entry.g:title: ADVANCE PHARMA CONDROPIL Glucosamine Sulphate 250mg (fr. seafood) Chondroitin Sulphate 200mg (fr. fish) 60s Fish Gel Cap
entry.g:description:
MAL07082985X
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION: Chondroitin is a naturally occurring substance formed of sugar chains. Chondroitin is believed to help the body maintain fluid and flexibility in the joints. Glucosamine is sugar protein that is believed to help develop and renew cartilage (the hard connective tissue mainly located on bones near joints in the body), and keep it lubricated for better joint movement and flexibility. The combination of chondroitin and glucosamine is used to aid in maintaining healthy joints. It is also used as a nutritional supplement in people with osteoarthritis or other inflammatory joint disorders. Not all uses for chondroitin and glucosamine have been approved by the FDA. Chondroitin and glucosamine should not be substituted for medications prescribed for you by your doctor. Chondroitin and glucosamine is often sold as an herbal supplement. There are no regulated manufacturing standards in place for many herbal compounds and some marketed supplements have been found to be contaminated with toxic metals or other drugs. Herbal/health supplements should be purchased from a reliable source to minimize the risk of contamination. Chondroitin and glucosamine may also be used for purposes not listed in Condropil guide.
OVERVIEW: "Contains Glucosamine Sulphate 250 mg and Chondroitin Sulphate 250 mg
*Slow the breakdown of joints in people with osteoarthritis
*Might keep osteoarthritis from getting worse as quickly as it otherwise might
* Reduces pain of osteoarthritis of the knee
* Essential to cartilage growth and repair"
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION: "Mild or moderate osteoarthritis: 2 cap twice a day for at least 6 wk. Severe osteoarthritis: Initially 2 cap 3 times a day for at least 8 wk, followed by 2 cap twice a day for 3-4 months.
Administration : Should be taken on an empty stomach."
INGREDIENTS: Contains Glucosamine Sulphate 250 mg and Chondroitin Sulphate 250 mg Gelatin capsule of fish origin

entry.g:title: CARDIPRIN 100MG 3X30S
entry.g:description:
Preventing strokes and heart attacks. Cardiprin 100 reduces the stickiness of platelets (the clot-forming part of blood), making them less likely to form a clot and helping to prevent blocking of blood vessels.
How to use your Cardiprin Calendar Pack: Start with the tablet in the section marked 'Take first'. On the next day, take the next tablet that corresponds with the day of the week.
Follow the arrows around the pack, taking one tablet each day, until all the tablets marked with the day of the week have been taken. To finish the pack, take the tablets from the section marked 'Take last'. A new pack should be started on the next day the same way. It is important to take your Cardiprin 100 tablet each day and ideally at about the same time.
Cardiprin 100 disperses instantly on the tongue without water and is pleasant tasting and easily swallowed. Cardiprin 100 tablets do not dissolve in water. However, if you prefer, they may be swallowed whole with water. The Cardiprin 100 Calendar Pack has been designed for your convenience to provide you with an easy check that you have taken today's tablet.
*Adult Dosage: One tablet daily. *Children Dosage: Not recommended for children and teenagers. *Each tablet contains 100mg of aspirin, a low dose shown by medical studies to effectively lower the risk of stroke and heart attack in people who have blood vessel disorders, with a low risk of side effects. *Cardiprin 100 has also been specially formulated to dissolve on the tongue for rapid absorption. *Some scientists believe that aspirin which is rapidly absorbed may be more effective in the prevention of strokes and heart attacks.
entry.g:google_product_category: Health & Beauty > Health Care > Medicine & Drugs

entry.g:title: Appeton Multivitamin Plus Infant Drops 30ml EXP:12/2022
entry.g:description:
Appeton Multivitamin Plus Infant Drop is a dietary supplement for infant 0-12 months; for the prevention and treatment of vitamin deficiency among infants. Infant age 0-12 months are mostly depending on milk as their food. Breast milk is often described as a baby’s best food but the content of breast milk changes throughout the nursing period. Diet and genetics affect the amount of vitamins in each mother’s breast milk, especially the amount of fat-soluble vitamins (Vitamin A, D, E, K) used to decrease over time. The low amount of vitamin D and little sun exposure suggest that some babies may need a supplement. Minerals in breast milk tent to be highest right after delivery and decrease over time. Even though breast milk has a very small amount of iron but babies are born with enough stored to last them the first few months of life. Beside that, others infant formula also low in certain nutrient example, infant formulas are low in vitamin C; fresh goat’s milk low in vitamin C, folate and vitamin D.
To avoid any insufficient of nutrient in newborns baby, Appeton Multivitamin Plus Infant Drop formulated a special dietary supplement for newborn baby and infant which complies 100% of USRDA with multivitamin and fortified with Lysine and Taurine. Lysine is an essential amino acid that cannot be synthesis by human body. It’s an important structural component of many proteins. Taurine is essentials for infants below 6 months as they cannot synthesis in the body and not able to store any significant amount of Taurine as well.
Appeton Multivitamin Plus Infant Drop comes with dropper for convenience and more accurate measurement to prevent overdose. It can be dropped directly into mouth or mixed with cereal, fruits juice or other food. There isn’t any additional artificial colouring which is safe for infants.
Features • 100% US RDA compliance. • Natural, yellow colored syrup with fruity flavor.
Indication • 1 ml per day. • Can drop directly on tongue, milk, juice or liquid food. Packaging • 30 ml per amber glass bottle. • Attached together with dropper for correct measurement.

A.Multifunctional Atomization Disinfection Sanitizer machine.
E.M CAN SEND***********
Disinfectant: to be used water-based disinfectant.
Step by step usage guide. 1. Turn on the power supply. 2.Press the dual switch towards I, and wait for the indicator lamp at the handle to light up. 3.Put in the disinfectant solution. 4.Adjust the time of atomization fogging. Max 5 minutes. 5.The machine will start to operate. 6.After completion of the fogging, wait for 10 minutes for the disinfection to complete. 7.Switch off the power supply, and disconnect the power cable. 8.Clean the machine by fogging with clean water. For this process activate the cleaning by pressing the dual switch to position II. 9.After completion press the dual switch to the centre “O” position. Store the machine in a clean dry place. Notes: 1.For indoor use. Close all windows and doors before starting the disinfection. Leave the doors and window closed for at least 10 minutes for the disinfectant to kill the viruses and bacteria. 2.Open the doors and windows after 10 minutes for ventilation to clear the air. 3.For vehicles disinfection. Similar 10 minutes closed door disinfection time is needed. 4.After disinfection open all doors for fresh air exchange to take place. 5.Be sure to use proven effective and safe water-based disinfectants. 6.Know what you are using. The active ingredients should be clearly stated on the label. B.BZK88 Disinfectant Sanitization Solution. The active ingredient is Bezalkonium Chloride 0.08%. It is a NON ALCOHOL ready to use SANITIZER solution for fogging and spraying. It is non-flammable, safe and effective.
BZK As a Bioactive agents Especially for its antimicrobial activity, benzalkonium chloride is an active ingredient in many CONSUMER products: >Pharmaceutical products such as eye, ear and nasal drops or sprays, as a preservative >Personal care products such as hand sanitizers, wet wipes, shampoos, soaps, deodorants and cosmetics >Skin antiseptics and wound wash sprays, such as Bactine.[4][5] >Throat lozenges[6] and mouthwashes, as a biocide >Spermicidal creams >Over-the-counter single-application treatments for herpes, cold-sores, and fever blisters, such as RELEEV and Viroxyn >Burn and ulcer treatment >Spray disinfectants for hard surface sanitization >Cleaners for floor and hard surfaces as a disinfectant, such as Lysol and Dettol antibacterial spray and wipes. >Algaecides for clearing of algae, moss, lichens from paths, roof tiles, swimming pools, masonry, etc.

entry.g:title: Live-well Alpha Lipoic Acid 150MG TABS 90S EXP: 10/2020
entry.g:description:
Science-Based Dietary Supplement Defends Against Free Radicals Not Suitable for Vegetarians Alpha lipoic acid (ALA) is a fatty acid that functions like a vitamin, although it is not classified as a vitamin. As a coenzyme, ALA plays an important role in the metabolism of glucose that produces energy in cells. ALA also has antioxidant properties and thus is important for controlling free radicals. Because it is soluble in both water and fat, ALA is sometimes referred to as the "universal antioxidant."
Supports the body's defenses against free radicals Recycles antioxidant nutrients such as vitamin C and vitamin E Helps maintain a healthy blood sugar level when used as part of the diet Suggested Use Adult Use: Take 1 to 3 time daily
Other Ingredients Cellulose, magnesium stearate (vegetable source), gelatin (capsule).

entry.g:title: Orihealth BZK21 QAC Aromatherapy Disinfectant Sanitizer with Sea Breeze Aromatherapy Essential Oil Non Alcohol 100ML
entry.g:description:
BZK21 Non Alcohol Disinfectant Sanitizer with Aroma Therapy Essential Oil 100ML SPRAY
PRODUCT INFORMATION
ACTIVE INGREDIENT Benzalkonium Chloride 0.16% Sea Breeze Aroma Therapy Essential Oil q.s.
NON ALCOHOL WITH AROMATHERAPY ESSENTIAL OIL FRIENDLY TO DELICATE HANDS
USAGE INSTRUCTION It is Ready To Use. Do Not Dilute. Use by manual spraying, wiping & rubbing. After application, let the contact surface to dry naturally. DO NOT RINSE AFTER APPLYING SUITABLE FOR USE on hand and hard surfaces. For Home, Schools, Religious Institutions, Commercial Premises, Industrial Factories, Healthcare Facilities, Food Preparation Premises etc.
It contains No Alcohol ,
Colourless, Non-greasy, Non-sticky, Non-toxic, Non-irritating & Child Friendly
Benzalkonium chloride (BZK) is a major non-alcohol-based active ingredient used for clinical, food line, and domestic household biocide
Kill 99.99% of germ, bacteria, fungi &viruses
A biocide is a general term for a chemical agent, that may be applied topically in/on living tissue (antiseptic) or on inanimate objects (disinfectant), in order to inhibit growth of (“-static”) or kill (“-cidal”) microorganisms
Benzalkonium chloride BZK is used in many non-consumer processes and products, including as an active ingredient in surgical disinfection
An advantage of benzalkonium chloride, not shared by ethanol-based antiseptics or hydrogen peroxide antiseptic, is that it does not cause a burning sensation when applied to broken skin.
The FDA has stated that benzalkonium chloride is eligible as an alternative for use in the formulation of healthcare personnel hand rubs .
In November 2020 The Journal of Hospital Infection published a study on benzalkonium chloride formulations; it was found that laboratory and commercial disinfectants with 0.13% to 0.28% inactivated the SARS-CoV-2 virus within 15 seconds of contact, even in the presence of a soil or hard water.
This resulted in a growing consensus that BZK sanitizers are just as effective as alcohol-based sanitizers despite the CDC guidelines.
As a hand sanitizer, use of BZK may be advantageous over ethanol in some situations because it has significantly more residual antibacterial action on the skin after initial application.
Benzalkonium chloride has demonstrated persistent antimicrobial activity for up to FOUR hours after contact where as ethanol-based sanitizer demonstrate skin protection for only 10 minutes post-application .

entry.g:title: 东北吉林秋木耳秋耳黑木耳 店长产地直采 Hei Mu Er Cendawan Hitam Black Fungus 150 GM
entry.g:description:
百科名片 木耳指木耳属（学名：Auricularia or Wood ear) 木耳，别名黑木耳、光木耳。真菌学分类属担子菌纲，木耳目，木耳科。色泽黑褐，质地柔软，味道鲜美，营养丰富，可素可荤，不但为中国菜肴大添风采，而且能养血驻颜，令人肌肤红润，容光焕发，并可防治缺铁性贫血及其他药用功效。主要分布于黑龙江、吉林、福建、台湾、湖北、广东、广西、四川、贵州、云南等地。生长于栎、杨、榕、槐等120多种阔叶树的腐木上，单生或群生。目前人工培植以椴木的和袋料的为主。 黑木耳中口感最好的光木耳主产区位于东北的大小兴安岭 和长白山上一带。
黑木耳的功效 1、黑木耳是优质的菌菇类食品,是人体天然保健食品.那多吃黑木耳究竟有什么好处呢? 多吃黑木耳的好处就是:黑木耳味甘,性平,有滋补、益胃、凉血、止血、清肺润肠的功效,对咯血、吐血、鼻血、痔疮出血、便秘有效. 2、黑木耳含有丰富的营养素，其脂肪成分中含有的卵磷脂、脑磷脂、鞘磷脂等磷脂类化合物，对于中老年人有特别的好处，可以帮助延缓老年人思维、记忆力减退及老年痴呆症的发生，还能降低血浆中胆固醇、脂肪含量。 3、黑木耳中的腺苷具有降低血脂和血黏度，抑制血小板凝集以及减轻动脉硬化、防止血栓形成、防止中风发生的功能。 4、黑木耳中的碳水化合物成分中的甘露聚糖、木糖、戊糖等多元糖醇和膳食纤维，不会引起血糖和胰岛素水平明显波动。多元糖醇和膳食纤维都有预防便秘，改善肠内菌群平衡，预防肠癌的作用。 5、黑木耳含有一些生物碱，具有促进消化道、泌尿道腺体分泌的特点，故有化解肾结石、胆结石，促使排出的功效。 6、黑木耳中的钙是一般肉类的30－40倍，是牛奶的2.3倍，所以是人体钙的最好的来源，是预防骨质疏松的天然食品。 7、黑木耳含铁量是菠菜的30倍，猪肝的4.3倍，大多数肉类的10倍，因此是缺铁性贫血者最好的补铁食品之一。 8、吃黑木耳贵在坚持，长期食用能够通便，降低高血脂、高胆固醇、高血黏稠度，对高尿酸血症也有好处。但是，具有出血倾向、消化不良、大便稀薄的人最好少吃或不吃。
黑木耳食谱
A. 木耳炒鸡蛋 主材：水发木耳若干，鸡蛋2个。 辅材：葱花，蒜末，食用油，盐，鸡精。 做法 1：木耳用水发好，洗干净，把下面的硬的抠掉，用手撕成小朵，用沸水焯一下。鸡蛋打好，备用。 2：热锅倒一点点油，把鸡蛋摊好，盛出来。 3：在刚才的锅里再倒一点儿油，油热6成左右的时候放蒜末，爆香，然后放木耳翻炒，看木耳有油亮亮的光泽以后，放入刚才摊好的鸡蛋，继续翻炒几下，撒一些葱花，放盐、鸡精，翻炒均匀后，出锅。 小诀窍 木耳要提前焯一下断生，这样炒的时候好熟。
B. 木耳炒黄花菜 简介 黄花菜含有丰富的脑及神经系统需要的营养物质，并具有“安五脏、利心志、明目”的功效。 木耳含有丰富的铁、磷、维生素B和蛋白质。常吃此菜对身体健康非常有利。 黄花菜消炎美容。常吃黄花菜还能滋润皮肤，增强皮肤的韧性和弹力．可使皮肤细嫩饱满、润滑柔软，皱褶减少、色斑消退、增添美容。黄花菜还有抗菌免疫功能，具有中轻度的消炎解毒功效，金针菜并在防止传染病方面有一定的作用。
材料 黄花菜（干） 50克, 干木耳（干） 15克, 盐 2克, 葱花 5克, 花生油 25克, 湿淀粉 15克, 蔬菜鲜味精 2克
做法 1、将干木耳用温水泡发，去杂质洗净并撕成小块备用。黄花菜用冷水泡发，去杂质洗挣并挤干水分备用。葱切成葱花，调好湿淀粉，蔬之鲜味精加温水80克调匀备用。 2、锅中加入花生油，六成热放入葱花煸出香味后加入木耳、黄花菜煸炒片刻，再加入调匀的蔬之鲜味精、盐，煸炒至黄花菜、木耳熟入味，用调匀的湿淀粉勾芡，出锅即成. 黄花菜炒木耳出锅了.

entry.g:title: Alkalising TRIPLE GREENS Detox De Stress Asid Gastrik Chlorophyll Chlorella Barley Grass Spirulina碱性排毒胃酸胃风解压绿藻大麦草蓝绿藻200g
entry.g:description:
EXP. 01/2022 BY NOVA 200g of powerful alkaline detox A super green food formula of pure Spirulina, Chlorella, Barley Grass and Soluble Prebiotics Fibers. A synergistic drink for effective alkaline cleansing, regulate body acidity and alkalinity, complexion and immunity. Seimbangkan asid dan detox usus
Usage Instruction:
10 gm once or twice a day. Mix well with a glass of drinking water, juices or milk before consuming. Drink immediately.
The Benefits of TRIPLE GREENS ALKALINE CLEANSING
It’s no secret that most people don’t eat enough vegetables.
Greens powders are dietary supplements designed to help you reach your daily recommended vegetable intake.
Benefits: May Help Prevent Chronic Disease
The antioxidant and anti-inflammatory actions of plant compounds in greens powder may help reduce your risk of chronic diseases.
In one four-week study in 10 healthy people, two tablespoons (10 grams) of greens powder taken daily lowered blood levels of oxidatively damaged proteins by 30% (1Trusted Source).
Preventing damage to blood proteins like enzymes is important, as they perform functions that help protect you from cancer and chronic diseases (12Trusted Source).
In another 90-day study in 40 people with high blood pressure, two tablespoons (10 grams) of greens powder taken daily decreased both systolic and diastolic blood pressure by about 8%. The control group observed no improvement (13Trusted Source).
Still, more studies are needed to confirm these possible benefits. EXP:01/2022 Other Detoxification Benefits Some greens powders claim to help with detoxification and make your body more alkaline— meaning higher on the pH scale of zero to 14.
However, consuming greens powder won’t affect your blood pH, which your body tightly controls within a narrow range of 7.35–7.45 (16Trusted Source).
On the other hand, your urine pH fluctuates within a broader range of 4.5–8.0. Eating greens and other vegetables can slightly elevate urine pH, making it more alkaline (2Trusted Source,16Trusted Source,17Trusted Source).
Some researchers speculate that small increases in urine alkalinity may help your body get rid of toxins, such as pesticides and pollutants. However, this hasn’t been well studied in humans (16Trusted Source,18Trusted Source,19Trusted Source,20Trusted Source).
Eating greens powders may still support detoxification in other ways. For example, when your liver detoxifies certain compounds, damaging free radicals are generated. Greens powders are rich in antioxidants, which can help combat these free radicals (21Trusted Source,22Trusted Source,23 Trusted Source).
Ingredients:
1.Chlorella 2.Barley grass 3.Spirulina 4.Prebiotic fibers (Inulin) Storage:
To be stored in a cool dry place. Close tightly after opening.

entry.g:title: Fogging Fumigation Machine with 5Litre BZKAR BZK Nano Mist Disinfection Solution (3 months warranty EXC SHIPPING)
entry.g:description:
NEW STOCK REDUCED PRICE A Convenient, Effective, Safe and Economical Disinfection Sanitization Package for indoor and vehicle disinfection and purification.
A.Multifunctional Atomization Disinfection Sanitizer machine.
Disinfectant: to be used water-based disinfectant.
Step by step usage guide. 1. Turn on the power supply. 2.Press the dual switch towards I, and wait for the indicator lamp at the handle to light up. 3.Put in the disinfectant solution. 4.Adjust the time of atomization fogging. Max 5 minutes. 5.The machine will start to operate. 6.After completion of the fogging, wait for 10 minutes for the disinfection to complete. 7.Switch off the power supply, and disconnect the power cable. 8.Clean the machine by fogging with clean water. For this process activate the cleaning by pressing the dual switch to position II. 9.After completion press the dual switch to the centre “O” position. Store the machine in a clean dry place. Notes: 1.For indoor use. Close all windows and doors before starting the disinfection. Leave the doors and window closed for at least 10 minutes for the disinfectant to kill the viruses and bacteria. 2.Open the doors and windows after 10 minutes for ventilation to clear the air. 3.For vehicles disinfection. Similar 10 minutes closed door disinfection time is needed. 4.After disinfection open all doors for fresh air exchange to take place. 5.Be sure to use proven effective and safe water-based disinfectants. 6.Know what you are using. The active ingredients should be clearly stated on the label. B.BZKAR Disinfectant Sanitization Solution. The active ingredient is Bezalkonium Chloride 0.08%. It is a NON ALCOHOL ready to use SANITIZER solution for fogging and spraying. It is non-flammable, safe and effective.
BZK As a Bioactive agents Especially for its antimicrobial activity, benzalkonium chloride is an active ingredient in many CONSUMER products: >Pharmaceutical products such as eye, ear and nasal drops or sprays, as a preservative >Personal care products such as hand sanitizers, wet wipes, shampoos, soaps, deodorants and cosmetics >Skin antiseptics and wound wash sprays, such as Bactine.[4][5] >Throat lozenges[6] and mouthwashes, as a biocide >Spermicidal creams >Over-the-counter single-application treatments for herpes, cold-sores, and fever blisters, such as RELEEV and Viroxyn >Burn and ulcer treatment >Spray disinfectants for hard surface sanitization >Cleaners for floor and hard surfaces as a disinfectant, such as Lysol and Dettol antibacterial spray and wipes. >Algaecides for clearing of algae, moss, lichens from paths, roof tiles, swimming pools, masonry, etc.
Warranty: 3 months, exclude delivery charges)

entry.g:description: Weight 100g 店长原产地直采 东北农家自产 野生区种植 黄花菜干 新鲜野生 自然日晒 无污染 无添加 无硫磺 金针菜 黄花菜 黄花菜（学名：Hemerocallis citrina Baroni；英文名：Daylily），又名金针菜、柠檬萱草，忘忧草，属百合目，百合科多年生草本植物，根近肉质，中下部常有纺锤状膨大。花葶长短不一，花梗较短，花多朵，花被淡黄色、橘红色、黑紫色；蒴果钝三棱状椭圆形，花果期5-9月。 黄花菜性味甘凉，有止血、消炎、清热、利湿、消食、明目、安神等功效，对吐血、大便带血、小便不通、失眠、乳汁不下等有疗效，可作为病后或产后的调补品。

entry.g:title: ORADEX ANTIBACTERIAL MOUTHWASH 2X400ML FOC ORADEX ANTIBACTERIAL 90ML
entry.g:description:
Product Features
Chlorhexidine mouthwashes is the number 1 dentist recommended rinse proven effective against micro-organisms in the mouth. It is a broad-spectrum “Gold Standard” oral antiseptic effective against bacteria, yeasts, fungi, some protozoa, algae and viruses. Chlorhexidine has a high intrinsic efficacy and a prolonged “residual” action.
Oradex Antibacterial Mouthwash contains 0.12% Chlorhexidine Gluconate and is both alcohol and paraben free. It is the preferred choice for the prevention and treatment of periodontal disease, swollen and bleeding gums, mouth ulcers and other common oral and throat infections.
Uses & Benefits
*Prevent dental plaque formation *Treatment of gingivitis, mouth ulcers, sore throat *Promote healing after oral surgery, dental implants, extractions and periodontal surgery *Control infection and reduce risks of aerosol contamination during dental surgery *Suitable for all ages and those sensitive to alcohol *User-friendly pleasant and soothing to the mouth without the side-effects of alcohol

entry.g:title: Potassium permanganate KMnO4 crystal 纯 高锰酸钾 25g
entry.g:description:
Potassium permanganate is an inorganic chemical compound and medication. Medicnal Uses: As a medication it is used for cleaning wounds and dermatitis (eczema). Other uses includes fungal infections of the foot, impetigo, pemphigus, superficial wounds, and tropical ulcers.
For topical use, the British National Formulary recommends 1g be dissolved in 10 liter of water before use to form a 1:10,000 (0.01%) solution. Caution : 1. Wrapping the dressings soaked with potassium permanganate is not recommended. this may cause irritation and burning of the skin. 2. Must not comes in contact with skin, especially wet skin, since this will cause chemical burn. Wash and soak with plenty of water should the need arises. Seek medical treatment is severe irritation occurs.
Aquatic Uses: it is used at a strength of 4ppm (4g per 1000 litre of water) for treatment of external fish infections from fungi, bacteria & parasites, Trichodinia, Costia, Chilodonella & Flukes. repeat treatment in 4 to 6 days if needed.
For water clarity use at 2ppm (2g per 1000 litre of water) concentration.
Caution: STOP active treatment immediately if fish show signs of extreme discomfort such as jumping or gasping for air. Neutralise by using 3% Hydrogen Peroxide at a dose of 30ml per 450 litre. Wait 4 days after neutralizing before treating again with Potassium Permanganate Solution. Do not use with any other treatments including water conditioners, dechlorinators, formalin, formaldehyde & medications.

entry.g:title: POLIDENT DENTURE CREAM FRESH MINT 20G
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Polident Fresh Mint Denture Adhesive Cream helps enhance the performance of dentures whilst providing a fresh mint flavour. Just three drops provide strong all-day hold.
It can be used on wet or dry dentures to hold them firmly in place for up to 12 hours. It also prevents food particles getting trapped under the plate.
As a cream formulation, it offers specific advantages to those denture wearers who may have oral abnormalities or receding gums. Polident denture adhesive creams also help to cushion tender tissues during the healing period after tooth extraction.
Adhesive cream use increases bite force by up to 50% Adhesive cream use reduces denture dislodgement whilst eating Adhesive cream use forms a protective seal that reduces food entrapment under the denture
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION 1. Polident (Poli-Grip) can be used on either wet or dry dentures.
2. Squeeze 3 short strips (5 to 10mm) on to each denture, away from denture edges. Adjust length of strips according to individual needs. Apply sparingly. Do not overuse.
3. Press dentures in place and hold firmly for about one minute.
4. After use clean dentures daily with Polident effervescent tablets or paste to remove accumulated plaque, bacteria and adhesive. Rinse under warm water.
INGREDIENTS Poly (Methylvinylether/Maleic acid) Sodium-Calcium Mixed Partial Salt, Carboxymethylcellulose, Petrolatum, Mineral Oil, Spray Dried Spearmint, Spray Dried Peppermint, Propyl Hydroxybenzoate, Erythrosine Cl45430 Does not contain Zinc

entry.g:title: PREGNANCY TEST EASY URINE WITH CUP 1 TESTS (to be very sure on results)
entry.g:description:
It's a Easy Urine with cup One-Step Test. The box contains only 1 test device where you will urinate directly on the absorbent tip
IMPORTANT: After you have completed the pregnancy test, whether you are pregnant or not, a rose pink color band will appear in the control portion of the window. This indicates that the Midstream test is working properly. As urine initially passes through the viewing window, the test band may momentarily be visible. This is not necessarily indicative of a positive result. Interpret results only after the complete test reaction time of 3 minutes. Positive: If 2 pink lines appear, 1 in the round testing window and 1 in the triangle control window, the test is positive and you can assume you are pregnant. Even if the lines are very light in color, you can still assume you are pregnant. Negative: If only 1 pink line appears in the triangle control window, the test is negative and you can assume you are not pregnant. Invalid: If a pink line does not appear in the triangle control window, the test is invalid. Invalid results may be an indication that the absorbent tip was not thoroughly saturated in urine. In this case, either urinate on the absorbent tip for additional time or re-dip the absorbent tip for 15 seconds and wait 3 minutes to read results. If there is still no pink line in the triangle control window, the test is invalid and testing should be repeated in a few days with a new Pregnancy Test. Follow the instructions exactly, making sure the absorbent tip is thoroughly saturated with urine. Each test is designed for a single use and should not be reused.

entry.g:title: CENTRUM SILVER MULTIVITAMIN 100S X 2
entry.g:description:
Centrum® Silver Specially Formulated for Adults 50 Years Old & Above As you age, your body goes through many changes that also affect your nutritional needs. However, meeting these needs may not always be easy.
Studies found that around half of Malaysian adults eat out most of the time. Most also fail to take the recommended servings of fruits and vegetables each day.1 These are alarming facts. Inadequate intake of essential vitamins and minerals can lead to nutrition gaps in your diet.
Centrum® Silver is an age-adjusted once-a-day multivitamin that is complete from A to Zinc. It is specially formulated to fill the nutrition gaps and support the changing nutritional needs of men and women age 50 and above. Directions for use: Seniors – Take one Centrum® Silver tablet daily after food with water. Important information If you are using blood thinner products such as warfarin, consult your doctor before use.

Descrition:
Armor8 is a revolutionary long-lasting sterilising nano spray. It uses light to eliminates bacteria, fungi, mold & allergens that causes illness & odors.
Fast, effective and long lasting, Armor8 is easy to use and protects your home, office and car by:
Killing 99.9% of germs on hard and soft surfaces.
Eliminates odors caused by bacteria, tackles unpleasant odors and leaving our home clean.
Killing to source of mold allergen and controlling the growth of mold and mildew on hard surfaces.
Armor8 spray is our ultimate in germ busting technology. Armor 8 eliminates germs such as:
*E Coli
*Human Pappiloma Virus (HPV)
*Streptcocca Bacteria
*Klebsiella
*Staphylococcus Aureus
The sprays are ideal for mothers, pet owners, gym enthusiasts, car owners, office workers and can also be used in public spaces such as preschools, food & beverage outlets and restrooms.
Protection against harmful bacteria and viruses
Previously only available commercially for businesses and public buildings, this award-winning Japanese technology is now available for the public to use at home or wherever they are. Armor8’schemical solutions are specially formulated tohelp fight against harmful allergens, microbials, bacteria, and viruses.These products are EPA-registered, hospital-grade disinfectant cleaners that kill 99.999% of bacteria including MRSA, Norovirus, E. coli, Salmonella enterica, Staphylococcus aureus, Legionella pneumophilia, Aspergillus niger and many more. These safe but effective sanitizers can help transform your residence or facility into a healthy environment.
Killing mold spores and odors
Our disinfectant sanitizers are also super-effective when it comes to killing mold spores and eliminating odors. Often, removing mold and bacteria can involve using strong chemicals, such as chlorine bleach products. These types of caustic solutions can produce trihalomethanes (THM) and halo-acetic acids (H AAS), that may trigger health problems which are linked to cancer. Armor8’s products contain only chemicals ruled to be safe and non-carcinogenic – safe enough foranysurface in your home or facility.

Uniqueness of Hempedu Bumi
Hempedu bumi or its scientific name Andrographis paniculata is also known as King of Bitter. The name is attributed to its extreme bitter taste of the plant. It is unique and as a bitter tonic where comparative studies have shown it to be superior to Milk Thistle (Silymarin) in its liver protective and bile promoting properties.1 Hempedu bumi can be found in a variety of habitats such as plains, hill slopes, waste lands, farms, dry or wet lands, seashore and even along roadside.

Herba Andrographis paniculata (Hempedu Bumi) - 400mg

Harwany
Harwany Pati Ikan Haruan Asli is produced from high quality black fish. The traditional ingredients are processed with the latest technology under strict GMP regulations to preserve the freshness and natural taste of the Haruan fish. Excellent Nutritional Values
Research has shown that Haruan has a high content of vitamin A, and at 60-70% of body mass, its protein content is also sizeable. It contains a large amount of essential omega-6 fatty acid, arachidonic acid. This fish also contains high levels of amino acids important in the wound healing process. These include glutamic and aspartic acid, as well as glycine, an important component of collagen in the skin.
Multiple Health Benefits
The consumption of Haruan fish not only facilitates the wound healing process but also reduces the pain associated with post-surgical recovery. It has been found that Haruan essence assists with the effects of morphine. There have also been preliminary findings related to antibacterial properties, and local researchers are focusing on efforts to identify the species associated with the relief of stomach ulcers.
*** Concentrated essence ***
*** Healing element ***

entry.g:title: LIVE-WELL LIVE WELL OSTECAL PLUS 100S BUY 2 FREE 1
entry.g:description:
The complete 7-in-1 Bone Formula (with Calcium, Magnesium, Vitamin D etc.) for strong bones and reduces risk of osteoporosis
Osteoporosis, which literally means porous bone, is a disease in which the bone density is reduced leading to increased risk of bone fracture. This disease affects people who are middle aged or older, which women are at a particularly higher risk because menopause is accompanied by oestrogen deficiency which accelerates bone loss. This increases a women's risk for osteoporosis. Worldwide, approximately 1 in 3 women over 50 years of age and 1 in 5 men over 50 years of age are at risk of an osteoporotic fracture.
Bone health can be affected by many factors such as heredity, diet, physical activity, hormonal levels and lifestyle. The importance of calcium has long been recognized in bone health. Lack of calcium in the body contributes to weak bones and an increased risk of bone fractures. However, as important as calcium is to bone health, only 25% women with osteoporosis are calcium deficient. New evidence clearly supports the view that multiple nutrients are essential for bone health and for reducing osteoporosis. Magnesium and vitamin D enhance the absorption of calcium. Boron and zinc in turn support metabolism of vitamin D. Manganese and copper are trace minerals that support bone health too. Live-well OsteCAL Plus provides calcium, magnesium, vitamin D, zinc, manganese, copper and boron in one synergistic 7-in-1 bone formula.
Who Will Benefit:
All ages:
- Children and Teens
Easiest way to prevent osteoporosis in later life is to ensure adequate calcium, vitamin D and minerals intake throughout childhood, teenage and early adulthood.
Those in the 20's, 30's, 40's, 50's and beyond
- In the 20's because the idea is to build up optimal bone mass by the time you are 30 years of age. After that, bone mass generally does not increase.
Usage:
For strong and healthy bones
Reduces risk of bone fractures and Osteoporosis
How to Take:
Children from 6 to 12 yrs:1 to 2 tablets daily after meals
Adults: 1 tablet 3 times a day after meals

entry.g:title: APPETON A-Z KIDS VIT C 30mg BLACKCURRANT 100S EXP:04/2022
entry.g:description:
Appeton A-Z Kid's Vitamin C
Appeton A-Z Kid's Vitamin C promotes stronger body resistance toward infection.
Most mothers are worried that their child will get sick, hence might not be able to enjoy themselves at school or during their play time. Therefore, it is useful for mothers to give vitamin C to the children to increase their bodies’ defense level so they won’t fall sick.
Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) is a water soluble vitamin which is necessary in the body to form collagen in bones, cartilage, muscle and blood vessels. It also aids in the absorption of iron in our body.
Vitamin C is beneficial especially to prevent children from catching common cold and cough. Vitamin C also helps to reduce duration of flu. Apart from that, Vitamin C is a potent antioxidant which protects our body cells from the damage caused by unstable molecules known as free radicals. It’s also found to decrease Helicobacter pylori bacteria, a risk factor to peptic ulcer disease and gastric cancer.
Appeton A-Z Kid’s Vitamin C is a chewable tablet in square shapes with engraved alphabetical design which special formulated for children. It is available in 3 flavours which are orange, strawberry and blackcurrant. Appeton A-Z Kid’s Vitamin C is free from saccharin.

entry.g:title: SUDOCREM NAPPY RASH CREAM 120G Exp 29/02/2024
entry.g:description:
Sudocrem® is now the Nation's favourite award winning nappy rash cream in Ireland and UK. Clinically proven to help treat nappy rash by soothing, healing and protecting delicate skin. Developed 80 years ago, tried and trusted by healthcare professionals for decades.
What does nappy rash look like ?
Depending on the severity of the rash, signs can vary from a shiny patch of red, scaly skin to hot, sore, spotty, fiery red skin if it becomes infected.
What causes nappy rash ?
*Urine in contact with baby's skin *Ammonia released after urine and stool mix causing inflammation of the skin *Friction caused by the nappy rubbing against your baby's delicate skin *Washing detergents not thoroughly rinsed out of terry nappies
Be alert to potential triggers of nappy rash :
*Teething *Antibiotics *Weaning *Diarrhoea *Change of milk type
How does Sudocrem® work ?
*Emmolient effect of Sudocrem® helps to soothe sore, inflamed skin whilst leaving it soft *Local anaesthetic helps to ease the pain and irritation *Other ingredients help to heal the skin *Water repellant base protects skin by forming a barrier, helping to stop irritants (uring and stools) coming into contact with the skin
Step by step guide to applying Sudocrem®
*Apply a thin layer of Sudocrem® to the affected areas *Gently massage Sudocrem® into the skin using small, circular movements. *DO NOT "rub" the skin as this may cause unnecessary friction. *There should just be a translucent film left on the skin. If the area stays white after application, then too much has been applied. *Renew application of Sudocrem® as required.

*Urine in contact with baby's skin *Ammonia released after urine and stool mix causing inflammation of the skin *Friction caused by the nappy rubbing against your baby's delicate skin *Washing detergents not thoroughly rinsed out of terry nappies Be alert to potential triggers of nappy rash :
*Teething *Antibiotics *Weaning *Diarrhoea *Change of milk type How does Sudocrem® work ?
*Emmolient effect of Sudocrem® helps to soothe sore, inflamed skin whilst leaving it soft *Local anaesthetic helps to ease the pain and irritation *Other ingredients help to heal the skin *Water repellant base protects skin by forming a barrier, helping to stop irritants (uring and stools)coming into contact with the skin
Step by step guide to applying Sudocrem®
*Apply a thin layer of Sudocrem® to the affected areas *Gently massage Sudocrem® into the skin using small, circular movements. *DO NOT "rub" the skin as this may cause unnecessary friction. *There should just be a translucent film left on the skin. If the area stays white after application, thentoo much has been applied. *Renew application of Sudocrem® as required.

entry.g:title: FLUIMUCIL A 600 EFFERVESCENT TABLETS 10S
entry.g:description:
Fluimucil A 600mg is a effervescent tablet. Each box contains 10 tablets.
Overview Fluimucil A is suitable for children and adults who have persistent cough with excessive phlegm associated with lung infections including acute and chronic bronchitis. Fluimucil clears phlegm and restores weakened lungs Ingredients N-acetylcysteine (NAC) Directions for Use Suitable for adult with persistent cough and phlegm, acute bronchitis or chronic bronchitis. Dissolve the effervescent tablet in a small glass of water, then drink the solution immediately after it is fully dissolved. Dosage Adult - 1 Fluimucil 600mg effervescent tablet a day. Contraindication Known hypersensitivity to acetylcysteine. As Fluimucil A contains aspartame, it is contraindicated in patients suffering from phenylketonuria. Contraindicated in children below 2 years of age Caution Patients suffering from bronchial asthma must be strictly controlled during the therapy: should bronchospasm occur, the treatment must immediately be stopped. Caution should be taken in patients suffering from or with a history of peptic ulcer. It is preferable not to mix other drugs with the Fluimucil A solution.

entry.g:title: BUY 1 FREE 1 Orihealth Lees Cocoa CocoArt RAW CACAO NIBS 224g EXP:07/21
entry.g:description: What is cacao? The difference between cacao and cocoa? 1. The Difference Lies in the Processing! Everything we know as chocolate, in all of its forms, starts at the same source: the Theobroma cacao tree. You can eat cacao beans raw. Their flavor is like a very bitter form of chocolate, and it varies depending on the growing conditions (soil, sunlight, etc.) of the cacao tree. Beans are usually fermented and dried before they’re processed any further (2). Raw cacao beans taste bitter, but they’re the healthiest when eaten this way. What happens next determines whether the beans become cacao or cocoa. They start from the same place, but the processing makes all the difference. 2. What Are Cacao Beans? Raw (or minimally-processed) cacao beans are superfoods. Here’s a quick rundown of some of their awesome health benefits: • Antioxidant effects. Cacao beans are absolutely packed with phenolic phytochemicals and flavonoids, which protect your cells against damage from free radicals (3). Oxidative damage can result in premature aging and many of the modern health conditions today (4). • Boosts your mood and cognitive performance. Epicatechin, the main flavonoid in cacao, improves various aspects of cognition, preserve cognitive abilities during aging, and even puts you in a better mood (5). • Lowers blood pressure. Recent studies found that flavanols lower blood pressure and increase blood vessel flexibility (6). • Protects your heart. Researchers found that flavanols and procyanidins from cacao increased antioxidant capacity in the blood plasma and reduced platelet reactivity, resulting in a healthier heart (7). • Regulates insulin levels. Epicatechin, a flavanol in cacao, activates key proteins and help regulate glucose production, even among diabetics (8). Cacao beans are also rich in nutrients like magnesium, iron, potassium, calcium, zinc, copper, and manganese (9). They’re actually thought to be one of the richest food sources of magnesium around (10)! Why The Difference Matters The heavier processing (heating at higher temperatures) that transforms cacao to cocoa doesn’t just affect how manufacturers label the end product. This heat actually affects the beans on a molecular level, changing their structure and degrading nutrient content (12). That means that cacao, which is less processed, has more powerful antioxidant effects and health benefits. 100 grams of raw cacao powder has an ORAC (oxygen radical absorbance capacity) of 95,500, which represents antioxidant capacity. This drops to 62,100 for cacao nibs, and 26,000 for cocoa powder (13). It’s not that cocoa is inherently bad for you; it’s just that cacao is more beneficial. Baking with either kind probably decreases some of the nutrients and antioxidants, but unfortunately research quantifying just how much is non-existent at this point. Bottom line: Heating cacao or cocoa degrades some of the nutrients and lessens potent antioxidant effects. Cacao retains more of the initial nutrients

entry.g:title: COTTON CREPE BANDAGE 10CMX4.5M NUR CARE
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
INTENDED OF USE: For treatment, after-care and prevention of recurrence of working and sports injuries, after-care of varicose veins damage and operation as well as for therapy of vein insufficiency
CONTRAINDICATION OF THE PRODUCT Do not use if the package is damaged or the product is expired Do not use if the product is damped or moulded
SPECIFICATION: SIZE: 10cm x 4.5m COLOUR : White MATERIAL Cotton + Spandex
Crepe bandages (also known as compression bandages or elastic bandages) are often used for the compression part of RICE—rest, ice, compression and elevation—the gold standard of first aid treatment for bruises and sprains.
Crepe bandages do a good job of compressing a new injury or inflammation and help keep swelling down. However, there's a limit to how long you should compress an injury. At some point, blood flow to the injured area needs to increase to encourage healing.
[ Usage guide: ] Here are some guide on the DOs and DON'Ts:-
DOs: ✔ Use crepe bandage only in the first 24 to 48 hours after an injury. ✔ Combine rest and elevation with compression whenever possible.
DON'Ts: ✘ Don't apply ice and compression at the same time. This can cause frostbite. ✘ Don't wrap crepe bandage too tightly. The idea is to discourage swelling, not to block blood flow altogether.
[ Specifications: ] - 100% Pure Cotton - Made from high quality porous, non-bleached natural cotton with non-fraying edges - Autoclavable, washable and re-usable

entry.g:title: OPPO KNEE SUPPORT 2022 BEIGE XL 1S
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
KNEE The knee joint includes the tibiofemoral, patellofemoral and superior tibiofibular joints. There are two menisci which are semilunar-shaped discs of fibrocartilage between the femoral condyles and tibial plateaus. Their main functions are shock absorption and stability enhancement. There are many ligaments to provide stability and prevent excessive motion. The anterior cruciate ligament (ACL), posterior cruciate ligament (PCL), medial collateral ligament (MCL), and lateral collateral ligament (LCL) are the key ligaments for stabilization of the knee joint.
FEATURE For arthritic knee conditions, minor sprains and strains. Provides firms support for the maintenance of joint structures with gentle compression over the kneecap. Improves healing and keeps joints and muscles flexible.
HOW TO WEAR 1. Hold the top of support using both hands, one on each side.
2. Insert foot into support and pull up to the knee.
3. Position knee cap under lighter color knit of the support.
APPLICATION Mild strain/ sprain Weak knee

entry.g:title: S&N PRIMAPORE 8.3CMX6CM 5 pieces/box
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Primapore Dressing Strip is a low allergy dressing strip. It is soft, comfortable and ideal for wounds in awkward areas. May be cut to desired length.
Features: Soft breathable cover Highly absorbent pad Low Allergy Adhesive Conformable pad and cover
Benefits
Highly absorbent and low-adherent pad The polyester wound contact layer on the pad enables the passage of blood or exudate into the highly absorbent pad whilst maintaining a good healing environment and minimal pain on dressing removal.
Secure Fixation The low allergy acrylic adhesive is evenly spread onto the non-woven backing surface providing a secure dressing fixation over the wound site.
Soft and Conformable Ensures patient comfort and conformability to all wound sites (even the more difficult areas like shoulders and axillae).
Ease of use The protector paper, which is slit across the width of the dressing, enables quick application without the risk of touching the absorbent pad or adhesive area with fingers or forceps. The easily opened packaging facilitates aseptic dressing technique.
Patient Comfort The thick pad minimises fluid strike-through and helps to protect the wound from trauma.
DOSAGE&ADMINISTRATION Wash hands before and after treating the wound. Gently clean and dry the wound and surrounding skin. Remove dressing from packing. Cut to size before applying Primapore.
Remove the release papers from both sides and smooth the dressing down. Change dressing daily, or as often required according to the condition of the wound. (Note: Apply pressure to bleeding wounds.)
CAUTION
Change dressing daily or more often according to the condition of the wound. As with all adhesive products apply and remove carefully from sensitive or fragile skin. Seek medical advice immediately for all serious wounds and burns, or if redness or discomfort occurs. Seek medical advice immediately for all serious wounds and burns or if redness or discomforts occurs. As with all adhesive products, apply and remove carefully from sensitive or fragile skin.

entry.g:title: Xukin-k Ezi Facial Cleanser for Acne & Oily Skin 35 ml
entry.g:description:
Acne# —A disease that affects the skin’s oil glands. The small holes in your skin (pores) connect to oil glands under the skin. These glands make a substance called sebum. The pores connect to the glands by a canal called a follicle. When the follicle of a skin gland clogs up, a pimple# grows. Acne is the most common skin disease; an estimated 80 percent of all people have acne at some point.
Xukin-K Ezi Facial Cleanser for all types of skins This is a pH 5.5# mild and gentle facial cleanser that cleans and rinses well. It removes surface impurities and oil effective. Prevent pore blockages, reduces formation of black and white heads. It helps to regulate the excessive sebum retention in follicles at the same time keeping the optimum skin moisture. Giving skin a pleasant smooth touch.

entry.g:title: NON Woven ALCOHOL SWAB PADS NUR CARE 200s
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION 100 individually Foil Wrapped Swabs with Isopropyl Alcohol 70% for optimum anti bacterial action, Use as an antiseptic skin cleanser before injection Four layer wrapper provides air-tight seal... prevents leakage and drying out.
Nur Care Alcohol Swabs are antiseptic skin cleansers made up of 75% isopropyl alcohol that provides optimum antibacterial action. Four layer wrapper provides air-tight seal These are used in cleaning the skin prior to injection with insulin syringes, pen needles and lancets.
So what are alcohol wipes used for? Alcohol wipes are often used to sanitize your skin and disinfect your surrounding area. Not leaving out the products that you use every day like pens, keyboards, elevator buttons and so on. Their many uses include cleaning up wounds, preparing the skin before any surgery, acting as a numbing agent towards insect bites and also to clean the skin before an injection or drawing of blood.
What alcohol is used to make wipes? The alcohol in a wipe or swab is called Isopropyl and it is often mixed with water to solely prevent the growth of bacteria on the skin and on any inanimate object. With a mostly medical background for its usage, alcohol wipes are often overlooked to be used outside of a medical setting.
FEATURES: » Saturated with 70% Isopropyl Alcohol » Use as an antiseptic skin cleanser » Air-tight four corner sealing » Individually wrapped for better hygiene » Prepare for injection and to clean injection or smoking equipment

entry.g:title: OPTREX EYE LOTION 110ML EXP:11-2022
entry.g:description:
EXP:11-2022 Optrex Multi Action Eye Wash washes, soothes and cleanses tired, irritated eyes.
Washes away particles such as pollen, dust, grit and smoke to cleanse the eye and with specially designed formula to sooth tired and treating sensitive eyes.
Modern living such as computer work, air conditioning, driving and particles such as dust, pollen, grit and smoke can damage the eyes' surface to make your eyes feel tired, uncomfortable and irritated.
Optrex Multi Action Eye Wash which also contains natural plant extract can wash away these particles to cleanse the eye and is specially designed to sooth tired and irritated eyes.
This flexiseal eye bath is specifically designed to fit comfortably against the eye to help prevent leakage.
How to use the wash:
~Ensure your hands are clean and dry and the bottle's seal is intact. ~Rinse the eye bath with product before use. ~Pour the wash into the eye bath until it's about a third full. Bend your head forward, holding the eye bath by its base. ~Place the eye bath over your eye and slowly raise your head with your eye open, so wash flows into it. Gently rock your head from side to side for at least 30 seconds. ~If the eye bath is likely to be used by more than one person it is a sensible precaution to sterilize it by boiling it in water. ~Optrex Multi Action Eyewash for tired, uncomfortable, irritated eyes is suitable for everyday use.

entry.g:title: COLD HOT PACK 28.5CMX11.5CM DURA R&R
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION R&R Dura soft cold/ hot pack is suitable for both cold and hot therapy. The soft cold/hot pack retains heat or coolness for a minimum of 45-60 minutes. The cold/hot pack’s gel remains soft and flexible after freezing. It is convenient, handy and your best partner for home healthcare.
BENEFITS 1. Ice treatment reduces muscle spasms, pain, swelling and bruising
2. Heat treatment is excellent for sore, stiff, nagging muscles, joint pain and injuries
3. Alleviates pain and soreness Enhances blood circulation and relieves fatigue
USAGE Cold therapy Place the pack in a freezer for at least 10-15 minutes before each use Remove and wrap the pack in a dry towel Apply to affected areas Hot therapy (Hot water) Place the pack in hot water (max 80 degree Celsius) for 10-15 minutes Remove and wrap the pack in a dry towel Apply to affected area Hot therapy (Microwave oven) Place the pack in a microwave open (recommended 800W) Always ensure the gel is evenly distributed in the pack Heat the pack for 30 seconds at a low power setting, heating times will vary with the power of the microwave If more heat is required, heat in additional 10 second increments until the desired temperature is reached Allow the pack to rest at least 1 minute before application

entry.g:title: DUODERM HYDROACTIVE GEL 30g x 1 tube
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION DuoDERM® Hydroactive® Gel is a clear, preservative-free, viscous hydrogel.
It is indicated for the management of partial and full-thickess wounds, ideally as a filler for dry cavity wounds to provide a moist healing environment that is supportive process by aiding autolytic debridement and allowing non traumatic removal of secondary dresing without damaging newly formed tissue.
It has been designed to be used for pressure sores, leg ulcers, and diabetic ulcers.
DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION 1. Cleanse the wound site, rinse well and dry the surrounding skin. 2 Unscrew the tube cap and remove the white safety ring. 3. Replace the cap to puncture the tube membrane. 4. Apply DuoDERM Gel directly into the wound. Do not fill the wound beyond the level of the surrounding skin. 5. DuoDERM Gel should be changed when the cover dressing leaks or is removed for routine dressing changes.
Maximum recommended wear time is seven days.
Storage: Up to 25°C; avoid freezing.
