Dosage / Direction for Use: Usually, the following dosage are divided in 3 times daily and administered orally. Adults: Tablet: 1-3 tablets daily in 3 divided doses. Syrup: 12-54 ml {60-270 mg (potency) as lysozyme chloride}. Children <2 years old: 3-6 ml {15-30 mg (potency) as lysozyme chloride}; 2-6 years old: 6-8 ml {30-40 mg (potency) as lysozyme chloride}; 7-14 years old: 8-12 ml {40-60 mg (potency) as lysozyme chloride}. In addition, the dose may be adjusted depending on the symptoms. There are still unknown factors concerning action mechanism of this drug in human body, and correlation between its dose and effects has not been fully clarified. It is suggested, therefore, that this drug should not be administered without specific therapeutic purpose.

entry.g:title: COLD HOT PACK MEDIUM 25.5cmx11.5cm Comefree
entry.g:description:
COMEFREE Cold/Hot Pack contains get which remains soft even when frozen ensuring comfort whether applied hot or cold.Ideal for headache, fever, sport injuries, tooth extraction, aching muscle, back pain, sinusitis, menstrual cramps and minor burns.
TO USE COLD
Store in freezer so pack is always ready for use. Remove and allow to defrost for 5 minutes. A minimum of 2 hours is needed freeze the gel.
HOT WATER METHOD
Wrap the pack in a towel and immerse in water about 90℃ for 5 minutes.
MICROWAVE METHOD
Flatten the pack and ensure the gel is evenly distributed. Set timer for about 1 minute / 450W, 2 minutes/ 400W, 3 minutes / 300W.
If more heat is required, microwave further at increments of 10 seconds, with equal standing time, until the desired temperature is reached. Record the total heating time for further reference.

entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION For strong long-lasting knee support, the Metal Support Knee Guard with Bio-Ray is developed to give coinciding benefits through its 3-in-1 pain relief, support and power offering. Through our innovation, we have created metal flexible enough to provide enhanced support without any restriction of movement.
This knee support brace is extremely useful for those who have recently undergone surgery and requires extra support for walking. Also recommended for active sports men and women who need enhanced knee stabilization to prevent risk of knee injury.
Features 3 in 1 features that helps to; relieve knee problem, stabilize the knee joint and provide power simultaneously. Innovative flexible metal that firmly supports and stabilize the knee joint. Soft stretchable material for optimal comfort.
Benefits Strengthens knee movements with more energy, reinforces support and lateral stabilisation. Helps the leg feel lighter, more relaxed and comfortable than before. Suitable for weak and stiff knees and post-surgery knee recovery. Highly recommended for sports-active individuals that engages in running or contact sports. And the elderly who require stronger support for their knees.
DIRECTIONS Slip knee support brace over the foot, with the wider opening wrapped around the thigh. Ensure fit is snug. Wear intermittently during the day for the first week and gradually increase length of wear. You can feel a difference after a few minutes of wear.

entry.g:title: ROWACHOL CAP for gall stones gall bladder health 100s ( EXP 01 / 2022 )
entry.g:description: Adjunct therapy for the dispersal [by dissolution and/or expulsion] of stones in the common bile duct. To be used in combination with chenodeoxycholic acid. It has been demonstrated that if ROWACHOL® is combined with either low or medium dose chenodeoxycholic acid, the gallstone dissolution rate is greater than if the same dose of chenodeoxycholic acid is used alone. Combined therapy enables a reduced dose of chenodeoxycholic acid to be used and there is therefore a lower incidence of side effects. ROWACHOL® increases biliary secretion, relieves spasm of the bile ducts, enhances metabolic liver function, reducing biliary stasis. By inhibiting HMGCoA reductase endogenous cholesterol production is reduced, maintaining the bile above saturation level, assisting dissolution of gallstones and preventing precipitation of further stones.

To wet and lubricate the surface of the eye for all patients with ocular discomfort caused by dry eye conditions.

entry.g:title: GAVISCON Liquid 200ML
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION Gaviscon Peppermint Liquid brings fast, soothing and long lasting relief from the pain and discomfort of heartburn and acid indigestion. It can be used to treat gastric reflux (a condition in which the acid stomach contents flow upwards into the food pipe) and flatulence caused by gastric reflux. It belongs to a group of medicines called 'reflux suppressants'.
Gaviscon original range works by forming a raft over stomach contents which helps to prevent the stomach contents including acid from flowing back up into the esophagus (food pipe), effectively relieving heartburn symptoms.
DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION Shake well before use. Adults and children over 12 years: 10-20ml after meals and at bedtime. Children 6-12 years old: 5-10ml after meals and at bedtime. Children under 6 years: Seek your doctor's advice. If symptoms persist, consult your doctor.
INGREDIENTS Sodium Alginate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Calcium Carbonate

entry.g:title: ULTRACARBON ACTIVATED CHARCOAL 2500mg 10s
entry.g:description:
Activated Charcoal 250mg
Indication: Suitable for diarrhoea and poisoning due to foods, heavy metals and drugs, flatulence (excess of gas in gastrointestinal tract) due to diet and other factors. Prevention of absorption in oral intoxications.
Dosage: Diarrhoea: Depending on the severity of the case, take 2 to 4 tablets 3 to 4 times a day. Half the dose is recommended for children. Should be taken on an empty stomach with plenty of water. Allow tablets to disintegrate in water with stirring, or take whole with liquid. It should be taken until stools have returned to normal.
Intoxications: In acute intoxications, depending on the individual case, charcoal tablets must be administered in a higher dosage. Adults receive 2 to 4 tablets per kg body weight, children 3 to 4 tablets per kg body weight. Dosage: - Adults and Adolescents or 60kg body weight and over: 120 to 240 tablets - Children 10-14 years or 30kg body weight and over: 90 to 120 tablets - Children 6 to 9 years or 20kg body weight and over: 60 to 80 tablets - Children 3 to 5 years or 15kg body weight and over: 45 to 60 tablets - Children 1 to 2 years or 10kg body weight and over: 30 to 40 tablets Stir tablets in water to make a paste and administer in small amounts. In unconscious patients, a healthcare professional should administer the suspension by gastric tube. Should be repeated 2 to 4 hourly.
Flatulency: - Adults: Take 1 or 2 tablets, disintegration in liquid, after meal and repeat every 2 hours or 2 tablets at 2 hours after meal.

DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION: GENTLY APPLY HIRUSCAR ON CLOSED WOUND 2-3 TIMES A DAY. FOR FACIAL USE, APPLY THE GEL BEFORE APPLYING MOISTURIZER OR MAKEUP FOR MORE EFFECTIVE ABSORBENCY. FOR OLD SCARS THAT ARE THICK AND BULGING, MASSAGE THE AFFECTED AREA FOR 2-3 MINUTES, 3-4 TIMES A DAY AND CONTINUE DO THIS FOR APPROXIMATELY 4 - 6 MONTHS.
TO PREVENT FRESH WOUNDS FROM LEAVING SCARS, ONCE THE WOUND HAS CLOSED, APPLY HIRUSCAR CONTINUALLY FOR 4-8 WEEKS.
6-8 WEEKS OF CONTINUAL TREATMENT IS SUGGESTED FOR SURGERY AND ACNE MARKS.
8 WEEKS OF CONTINUOUS TREATMENT IS SUGGESTED FOR BURNS FROM FIRES, EXHAUST PIPES OR HOT WATER."

entry.g:title: BACTIGRAS 10cmx10cm 3 pieces ( EXP :08/2023 )
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
BACTIGRAS is a gauze dressing impregnated with paraffin, containing 0.5% chlorhexidine acetate. It is presented as individual dressings in peel-apart pouches.
How BACTIGRAS works BACTIGRAS acts as a barrier between the wound and a secondary dressing such as MELOLIN low adherent wound dressing, allowing wound fluid to pass into the absorbent secondary dressing. The chlorhexidine acetate antiseptic is slowly released from the dressing, giving long lasting action against a range of bacteria.
What BACTIGRAS is used for
*Minor burns *Grazes *Cuts BACTIGRAS can be used on wounds where there is a risk of infection or on already infected wounds if the person has been prescribed oral antibiotics.
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION
1. Wash hands before and after treating wound. Gently clean wound and surrounding skin. Dry surrounding skin thoroughly.
2. Peel open foil sachet. Cut dressing to size.
3. Remove protective paper to reveal BACTIGRASgauze.
4. Place BACTIGRAS onto the wound.
5. Place second dressing(e.g. MELOLIN pad) over BACTIGRAS for added protection and absorption. Keep BACTIGRASin place with either paper tape or a light crepe bandage.

entry.g:title: PSYLLIUM HUSK D NATURAL 天然车前子纤维 2X250G EXP:03/2022
entry.g:description:
Psyllium husk or isphagula is the covering of seeds grown on the plant, Plantago Psyllium, which flourishes in the Middle East. Psyllium husk has long been recognized as an excellent means of getting more dietary fiber into a person’s diet due to its high fiber count in comparison to other grains. Oat bran, also a good source of fiber, has about five grams of fiber per a third of a cup. Psyllium husk, on the other hand, offers approximately 71 grams of fiber for that same third of a cup. This heavy dose of dietary fiber makes psyllium the choice of many who manufacture dietary fiber supplements and powders like Metamucil. For those suffering from constipation or diarrhea, appropriate daily dietary fiber intake can help improve these conditions. As psyllium husk travels through the human digestive tract, it absorbs water, but is not digested. This results in stool that is bulkier, but also softer, translating to fewer problems with passing stool.
Although most associate psyllium husk with improving digestion, clinical studies on isphagula have also shown that it is beneficial in lowering blood cholesterol. Of course, cholesterol is more likely to be lowered when combined with a low fat diet. Yet even with a higher fat diet, psyllium, when taken regularly, lowers low-density lipoproteins, known as “bad cholesterol” by about 7%.
Some studies have also suggested that regular use of psyllium supplements may help pass more fat in stools, translating to weight loss. Other studies suggest psyllium may also be helpful in lowering blood sugar counts. These studies are still in their infancy and have yet to truly prove that psyllium husk can be beneficial in these ways.
It is important to be careful with psyllium. Some complain of bloating or gas when first using the product. Most doctors suggest taking several weeks to work up to a full dose of this dietary fiber. Early reactions might include diarrhea and flatulence.
Some people are severely allergic to psyllium. This is especially true of those who handle large amounts of psyllium husk to prepare laxatives. Some have had anaphylactic shock reactions to taking psyllium. Intestinal obstruction may also be a risk for some, particularly those who have had surgery on the intestines or bowels.
The most important thing to remember when taking psyllium husk is to take it with lots of water. Drinking a full glass with the supplement, and six or seven more glasses a day is recommended. This may be easy to remember if you’re taking a supplement like Metamucil, but don’t forget that plenty of high fiber cereals like Bran Buds and Heartwise contain psyllium and should be consumed with a large glass of water on the side, and at least six more glasses of water during the day.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
How Does Abate Work?
Dengue fever is spread by Aedes mosquitoes. The control of Aedes larvae with Abate® 1.1G is an effective way of controlling the spread of dengue fever. By applying Abate to standing water where mosquitoes and other insects breed, you will kill the larvae before they develop into mature mosquitoes. This method provides board community protect.
Abate Works Fast And Last Long
Abate® 1. 1G in water retains its efficacy for at least 2 months if water is not replenished or replaced. It is an economical and efficient way to keep your environment Aedes-free.
In addition, because Abate is a different chemistry from pyrethroid (insecticide) sprays targeting mature mosquitoes, it works to greatly reduce the chances of resistance compromising your overall mosquito-control effort and helps you quickly get mosquito population under control.
Application: 2 grams or 1 teaspoon per 18 liters of water
Applicable to: * Portable water containers * Non-consumable water tank * Vase * Flower pots * Base plates * Roof gutter * AMERICAN CYANAMID COMPANY BRAND

entry.g:title: ActiveLife Oat Plus 23 560gm
entry.g:description:
Product Overview: Oat Plus 23 offers a hassle-free, convenient, enjoyable and clinically proven way to help you lower your cholesterol levels.
What is Cholestetrol ? Oat Plus 23 is a palatable blend of high grade oat bran powder with minimum 20% beta-glucan, oat flour with about 4%-5% beta glucan and Inulin (Chicory Root Extract), a superior prebiotic, developed specially for health-conscious individuals who want to live life to the fullest. It is fortified with Co enzyme Q10 (Ubiquinone) a powerful antioxidant found throughout the body especially in the heart, liver, kidney, and pancreas and is used by the body to transform food into adenosine triphosphate (ATP), the energy on which the body runs.
A daily intake (2 servings) of Oat Plus 23 provides 3.76g of high molecular weight oat beta glucan. On its own, Beta Glucan’s effectiveness in lowering total and LDL cholesterol has been clinically proven and acknowledged by world renowned authorities such as FDA (US Food and Drug Administration), EFSA (European Food Safety Authority) and MOH (Ministry of Health), Malaysia. According to these acclaimed bodies, 3g per day of beta glucan can help to reduce cholesterol.
A daily intake (2 servings) of Oat Plus 23 also contains 5.4g of Chicory Root Extract (Inulin), a premium and preferred prebiotic. Though the insoluble fibers in oat bran and oat flour do have some prebiotic effects, they are mild compared to Inulin which works faster and better in restoring intestinal flora balance. That is why MOH, Malaysia approves the claim ‘Inulin is prebiotic’ or ‘Inulin is bifidogenic’ for food with minimum 1.25g of Inulin per serving .
Promoting intestinal flora balance and enhancing gut probiotics are important because many studies have shown that probiotics can help to lower cholesterol levels too, besides the many benefits such as better nutrient absorption, stronger immune system etc.
The addition of Co Q10 to Oat Plus 23, takes the “cholesterol fight” a step further. Cholesterol is feared because too much of it can lead to the build-up of plaque in the blood vessels and block blood flow. This can lead to increased risks of developing CHD (Coronary Heart Disease), heart attack, stroke and other CVDs (cardio-vascular diseases). Studies have indicated that blood lipids and cholesterol oxidised by free radicals, tend to settle on the blood vessel wall and ultimately form plaque leading to atherosclerosis. CoQ10 being a powerful lipid-soluble antioxidant can neutralize the free radicals and prevent them from oxidizing the lipids and cholesterol, thus preventing plaque formation.
Dosage and administration: Each serving (20g) of Oat Plus 23 contains 1.88g of oat beta-glucan and 2.7g of inulin. Great Taste. Low in Sodium. High in Fiber. Suitable for Vegetarian. Lactose free.
Ingredients: Oat Bran Powder, Dextrose, Chicory Root Powder & CoQ 10.

entry.g:title: EUROBIO Saw Palmetto Plus Cranberry 60s Vege Cap Vegi Cap Vegetable Capsules
entry.g:description:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION: Eurobio® Saw Palmetto Plus Cranberry is a synergistic formulation with four natural extracts, helpful for supporting bladder, urinary tract and prostate health. Benign prostatic hypertrophy (BPH) is a slow progressive enlargement of the prostate gland. As prostate grows, it compresses the urethra (the tube that drains urine from your bladder), impedes urine flow, and causes incomplete emptying of bladder and urinary tract infection. Saw Palmetto has been shown to improve symptoms of BPH, such as poor urine flow, "burning urination" and night-time urination. Pumpkin Seed provides a good source of two unsaturated fatty acids, Oleic and Linoleic Acids, which help relieve symptoms of BPH. Pygeum enhances the improvement of urination symptoms of BPH, including reducing the frequency of night-time urination, urinary hesitancy and pain associated with urination. Cranberry enhances the prevention of urinary tract infection.
OVERVIEW: "Benefit:Indicated for prostate health Relieves symptoms of BPH including night-time urination, ""burning urination"", urinary hesitancy (difficulty in starting and finishing urination), painful urination, weak urinary flow and urinary tract infection Helps support and maintain healthy bladder and urinary tract Beneficial for men and women Features:Synergistic 4 in 1 formulation with Saw Palmetto, Cranberry, Pumpkin and Pygeum No added preservatives, colors, flavors, salt or sugars Formulated in vegetable capsules, suitable for vegetarians"
DOSAGE AND ADMINISTRATION: 1-2 vegetable capsules daily
INGREDIENTS: "Saw Palmetto Berry Extract Cranberry Fruit Extract Pumpkin Seed Extract Pygeum Bark Extract"
MAL20034710T
